Cosmetically this is one great looking computer with awesome video quality and color. The exterior is a slick bronze color similar to the color of my gold iPhone. It's a bit heavy and too large for one-handed use. Manufacturer info says the computer is pre-installed with backlit keyboard and I did not notice this feature when using the computer in dim evening light. Backlighting was not visible. Powercord is lightweight and not chunky like previous Toshiba cords. The powercord connection on the computer does cover the input jacks, so I had to turn the cord a few times to test the input jack. The sound is AWESOME with SkullCandy built-in speakers. The dual keypad is awkward to use and there is a learning curve to make sure I clicked the left side or right side of the keypad. Too often I was clicking intuitively and then getting undesired results.The 360 degree design is functional and fun. The computer converts to a tabletop presentation for audience view. This would be handy for many professionals. The tablet function is interesting, except I did not like the keyboard resting on my lap when using the computer as a tablet. It's also bulky in size and heavy in weight for tablet use.The computer processing speed is VERY SLOW and it took forever for Google searches, downloading, and online social media use. Very  SLOW. Computer warned me the initial estimate for downloading Chrome would be 12 hours. Yes, 12 hours. The estimate kept vacillating between 12 hours and 37 minutes to download the Chrome browser. I have a super high seed wifi and download large files DAILY so this was a distraction and annoyance to experience slow speeds. My family uses streaming video and speed is critical to our enjoyment.Windows 10 is preinstalled and has its own challenges. It's tricky to change the default search engine and browser.In sum, the Toshiba Satellite Fusion 15 L55W-C5257 15.6-Inch Convertible 2 in 1 Touchscreen Laptop would be useful for someone with patience and slower processing time. It's not functional for school use because the size will not fit in a backpack like the smaller notebook computers my kids use at their school. Likewise for travel this is a tad too wide and heavy. For in-office presentations the device is attractive and functional as a presentation, tablet or computer. I would not recommend this for streaming video or downloading.

I enjoy gluten free, dark chocolate snacks and the Brookside Dark Chocolate Fruit and Nut Bars, Blueberry with Acai attracted my attention. The product is promoted as "no artificial flavors, good source of fiber, good source of antioxidant, gluten free." Dark Chocolate and Acai are often found in my diet. Based on my experiences in this area, I found the Brookside Dark Chocolate Fruit and Nut Bars, Blueberry with Acai not a pleasant flavor. It was much too sweet, the blueberry flavor and corn syrup are stronger than the chocolate. This is not something I would buy for myself or my family because of the taste.Each bar measures approximately 1-inch by 3.75 inches.Nutrition facts on the box: 180 calories, 9g fat, 55mg sodium, 22g carbs, 3g fiber (box says good source of fiber), 13g sugar, 4g protein.Ingredients per the box: Almonds, dark chocolate, sweetened blueberries, sweetened cranberries, high maltose corn syrup, blueberry juice concentrate, whole grain rolled oats, brown rice, (and more).This is not a healthy snack and the taste is much too sweet.

My family loves anything chocolate and Hershey is one of our favorite brands. These Hershey Golden Almond Chocolate Bars are nicely packaged inside a slim box. The colors gold, brown and red are arranged in a decorative pattern, with the word ALMOND spelled out in large bold letters. The box includes five thick chocolate bars. Each bar is 2.8 ounces per the package label and I measured the dimensions 4.75 x 1.5 inches.The flavor is not disappointing and while the bar is thick chocolate, it was easy for me to bite into and enjoy. My Amazon shipment arrived on a 100 degree day and I was delighted to see they chocolate was not melted or destroyed by the postal delivery service.Per the label, the bar is 29 g fat, 420 calories, 50 mg sodium, 38g carbs, 33 g sugar, 10g protein.Allergy information is printed on the label BUT not in bold letters and is difficult to read on the shiny gold package. Likewise the allergy warning is not distinct on the back of the decorative box.  The word ALMOND is spelled out on the front of each bar and each bar.

Brilliant Design and Easy to InstallMy husband and I both work at home and find the solicitors who ring the doorbell to sell products are disruptive to our work and privacy. So we installed the Myfox Wi-Fi Security Camera and within the first hour of installation we watched the gardeners maintain our yard, the painter patch the holes on the house, and two Jehovah Witnesses leave a flyer on the porch. This camera is getting a workout! It's like caller ID for my front porch!Installation was super easy. Install the MyFox app to your cell phone and follow the instructions on screen. It takes a few minutes for the "barcode" to identify the camera, so try moving the phone and camera different distances until you hear the confirmation "beep" which indicates the camera is activated with your phone. Add additional family members or guests to the account. Options include Owner, Kids, and Guests. If you are out of town and need a house sitter this is a good method for the sitter to watch the exterior of the home. You could install an interior camera as a baby monitor too! 2-way radio on the device allows communication options.The video quality is excellent color and clarity. There is an HD option that can be turned on or off. When the sun shines on the window it causes a glass reflection on the video image. Manufacturer website does not recommend placing device near heat or direct sun. The powercord is long enough to reach from my wall outlet to the window. Optional video cloud service is available from MyFox for one-day or seven-day backup. This would be handy if you travel or if you are having Amazon packages delivered to your house via postal deliver or drone! Watch those packages arrive and know when to call a neighbor and ask her to pick the package off your porch if you're away from the house or out of town.I've already recommended this camera to my family and friends and I'll be buying a second camera soon.

This tape exceeds what I expected! First, there is an awesome thumb indent for right handed people like me. Second, as I'm applying the tape I can see through the "window" on the tip and make sure I am only covering the errors and when to stop applying the tape. Third, the quality of the tape is fantastic. It's not too wide nor too narrow and the texture is much better than liquid products which are lumpy and uneven surfaces. I don't need to wait for the product to "dry" and can write over the correction tape after applying it to my paper. The see-thru dispenser lets me know when my correction tape is running low.Package shows orange and blue colors and the color I received from Amazon are yellow and raspberry pink!

UPDATE: After 3 weeks of school the bottom of the backpack has a hole in it. This style with the imitation fabric on the bottom is NOT DURABLE! See attached photo!I thought this was an awesome backpack...until it fell apart after THREE WEEKS. As a #CaliforniaMom I am not happy spending $50 on an item that did not last. We have always used this brand for school and it's the first time a backpack fell apart. I think the stylish bottom panel (imitation leather look) is not as durable as the canvas on the other Jansports that we own.Since I bought this before school started and it's not past the 30-day return window, I hope that Amazon or Jansport will give me a refund or replacement.

This Air Purifier is a perfect solution to keep our family healthy! I started waking up sneezing almost 25 times each morning and knew something was in the air. So I called a professional company to clean my air ducts and heating units (see image) and then installed this quiet air purifier in my bedroom. I am pleased with the performance and my symptoms have improved when I keep the purifier running. The filters are easy to remove and clean.One drawback is the smell from the purifier unit. I'd describe it as a smell associated with electronic devices. Hopefully this issue will go away over time.An added bonus of the purifier is that it also works as a cooling fan with a slight rotation. At night I turn the fan to low and it's barely a whisper. During the day the fan is at full setting and does make a noticeable noise. I keep the device three feet from the wall so the air is circulating and cleaned.Image: the image is from my heater and shows the air that is circulating inside my home.

Malestrom: Manhood Swept into the Currents of a Changing World  by Carolyn Custis James is an intellectual and well-researched examination of culture. She digs into "male power" from a cultural and Biblical perspective.  Chapter topics include:The Father WoundThe Rise of WomenThe Marginalized ManGender Role ReversalThe Manhood of JesusLiberating Men From the MalestromI'm a fan of Carolyn Custis James books, especially The Gospel of Ruth which my pastor recommended reading. The Malestorm book is more challenging and might be difficult to read at times. Her writing style in this book resembles the thesis work of a graduate student rather than entertainment writing typically associated with books.I received this book free from the publisher. I was not required to write a positive review and the opinions I have expressed are my own. I am disclosing this in accordance with the Federal Trade Commissionâ€™s 16 CFR, Part 255 : â€œGuides Concerning the Use of Endorsements and Testimonials in Advertising.â€

For the Love: Fighting for Grace in a World of Impossible Standards by Jen Hatmaker is fun to read! The book is crafted from the perspective of "turning 40" and a reflection through Jen's Christian life as a wife and mom. The humor is witty and entertaining! Book chapters include:Run Your RaceSurviving SchoolMarriage FunDifficult PeopleDear Christians, Stop Being CrappyWhile the book is funny, Jen's overall objective is "..to help lead  tribe that does more healing and less hurting." Her raw testimony is sprinkled with jaw-dropping wisdom you don't want to miss!I received this book free from the publisher. I was not required to write a positive review and the opinions I have expressed are my own. I am disclosing this in accordance with the Federal Trade Commissionâ€™s 16 CFR, Part 255 : â€œGuides Concerning the Use of Endorsements and Testimonials in Advertising.â€

To be human is to face conflict and the resulting temptations of bitterness, resentment, anger and unforgiveness. As Christians we are called to forgive and upon completion of this Bible study you'll have developed a forgiveness toolbox applicable to every aspect of your life. Learn to forgive others, yourself, and even God- release the weight of your heart. Melissa has a gift for bringing ancient biblical stories to modern life. She recounts the forgiveness story of Joseph with accuracy, and applies the lessons into a modern day experience that is easy to understand. Highly recommended!Weekly Lessons IncludeWeek 1: Acknowledging the PainWeek 2: Waiting to Be RememberedWeek 3: Dreams Come TrueWeek 4: The Roller Coaster RideWeek 5:Grace and BoundariesWeek 6: Moving ForwardIn the back of the workbook Melissa includes a Recommended Reading List with 15 books on forgiveness. This is an excellent study for local small groups, online small groups or independent study.The publisher website has additional resources for Digging Deeper.

I remember my great-grandmother wore aprons when I was a child and this is a family memory I want to pass on for my own children. Those old "grandma aprons" are really dated and out of style. When I saw the WINE COLOR DII 100% Cotton, Printed Damask Chef Kitchen Apron I knew it was something I'd enjoy! This is one of my favorite colors so I was very excited to find a beautiful apron that reflects my style!The wine color and pattern looks awesome over dressy black pants or casual denim. The stitching quality is slightly irregular, with the top thread tighter than the bottom thread and there is a slight imperfection. Since the stitching is overlaid on the top of the apron (rather than hidden inside seams) it's noticeable but only up close. The fabric quality is superb...thick and sturdy. Pockets are generous and allow me to carry my cell phone rather than sitting it on the kitchen counter where it's likely to get splashed with cookie batter.Since I am petite, the neckline is much lower than I'd prefer but this can be remedied with a few stitches around the neck strap. Overall length is perfect and apron protects clothing well. I am amazed at the low price for such a fine quality product. I'll be buying more aprons as gifts for my friends and family.I saw a few OLD Amazon reviews from 2012 about thin fabric (not at all like the one I received) or color inaccuracy. This was not my experienced with the apron and the one I received is thick fabric and a beautiful wine color. Perhaps the manufacturer has made improvements in the last three years based on customer feedback.

When I researched Bible journaling ideas, these pens were recommended so I purchased a set. They arrived well-packaged inside an easy-to-open plastic sleeve. Included are six pens in these sizes:.20mm.25mm.30mm.35mm.45mm.50mmMy first observation is that the pens are not erasable like the FriXion pens I normally use. My second observation is the sharp edge of the pens and a few times I did notice indentations in the Bible pages beneath my journaling. One method to keep the pens from tearing or indenting multiple pages might be to use a thin cardboard beneath the page you are journaling.Because I keep my Bible on my lap when reading, I'll occasionally notice my underlines are uneven. When this happens I like using the erase feature on the FriXion pens.My daughter is an artist and these fine point pens are perfect for her designs! For Bible study I prefer a softer edge and erasable feature.

When I researched Bible journaling ideas, these pens were recommended so I purchased a set. They arrived well-packaged inside an easy-to-open plastic sleeve. Included in the sleeve is a color-code guide:Yellow= whoBlue= whatPurple= whenGreen= wherePink= whyBlack= notesMy first observation is that the pens are not erasable like the FriXion pens I normally use. My second observation is the sharp edge of the pens and a few times I did notice indentations in the Bible pages beneath my journaling. One method to keep the pens from tearing or indenting multiple pages might be to use a thin cardboard beneath the page you are journaling.I did observe the ink is visible on the backside of the Bible page. So when I see all those pretty Bible journaling photos I need to remember the page underneath is probably going to be difficult to read.See Photos>> For my review I took sample photos and compared the Pigma Micron pens with the FriXion Pens. The first line is the Pigma sample and the second line in the same color is the FriXion pen.Because I keep my Bible on my lap when reading, I'll occasionally notice my underlines are uneven. When this happens I like using the erase feature on the FriXion pens.This is a fun tool for Bible journaling as long as you remember three things: 1) You can't erase 2) the edges are sharp 3) you can see the color on the underside page

Iâ€™ve always been a fan of Joanna Weaver books and Iâ€™ve been waiting to review Lazarus Awakening DVD Study Pack, a video Bible study filmed in the Holy Land. If youâ€™re like me and unable to visit the historical sites where Jesus walked, then youâ€™ll enjoy the DVD! Set aside a time and a location for this journey into the tomb of Lazarusâ€¦and discover your own resurrection of faith. Find your place in the heart of God.The Lazarus Awakening DVD Study Pack includes eight video sessions, each lasting from 17 minutes to 20 minutes in length. There are a total of three DVDâ€™s and the entire series requires almost three hours of viewing time. This is an excellent opportunity for local small group study, individual Bible study, or a mini-retreat. After watching the sessions Iâ€™d recommend a mini retreat! Take breaks between the video sessions and read Bible passages referenced in the video. Write in your journal what the Holy Spirit has placed upon your heart. Set a day for your mini-retreat at homeâ€¦ just you and Jesus, or set a location with a few friends.Filmed in the most beautiful locations, this video Bible study is eloquent, unscripted and heart-driven!I found myself captivated by Joannaâ€™s voice, her deep passion, and her personalization of the stories she teaches. She has a gift for organizing key concepts into eight sessions, and then presents a verbal outline of the key points. Write down these key points in your related study guide included in the DVD set.Disclosure: I received this free from the publisher. I was not required to write a positive review and the opinions I have expressed are my own. I am disclosing this in accordance with the Federal Trade Commissionâ€™s 16 CFR, Part 255 : â€œGuides Concerning the Use of Endorsements and Testimonials in Advertising.â€

I purchased and reviewed this product and my amazon review was hidden. I'm reposting the review a second time today. My daughter asked to buy these to decorate her bedroom. When they arrived the circles are smaller than shown on the image. These are the size of a quarter or dime and  very disappointing. I am returning the product for a full refund. Most of the stickers are the size of my fingernail and not the size as shown in the product image.I'm unsure why my first review was deleted here. I uploaded an image of the product and perhaps that is why?

The appealing advertising and product merchandising on this router makes it really attractive. When the box arrived I think I saw my husband hug the thing! His relationship faded with a short time as the router performance was less than desirable. The first issue is the four external antennas shown in the upright position. When attaching the four external antennas I heard a rattling noise in two of them. After attaching these external antennas they would not position vertically as shown and they kept falling down. Clearly two of the four external antennas arrived defective.I continued the installation and it did improve the speed of my family network (running 16 devices). We gave it a good workout! The media prioritization is a great benefit and allows us to give higher priority to work computers and normal priority to the Apple TV or the Wii connection.I'm giving the device three stars: speed and media prioritization are a benefit, the defective external antennas were a disappointment.

Empty Hands by Sister Abegail Ntleko is truly inspiring. From the time I picked up and read an advanced copy for review, I was immediately sharing her amazing story with my husband, daughters and friends. Each chapter left me in amazement at the remarkable strength of this intelligent and compassionate lady. She has much wisdom that can be applied in the mission field, in local churches, in our communities and in our homes. Her philosophy is to "Meet people where they are in their lives and accept them." She does this in the face of unimaginable adversity.There are many cultural and religious experiences in her story. As you read the book you'll be exposed to South Africa during poverty, apartheid, male dominance and AIDS. Sister Abegail Ntleko walks her readers through her own journey of faith, from numerous Christian churches, Buddhist friends, and Zulu traditions. If you try to put the author inside the parameters of conformity then you'll be disappointed in your effort. She is a remarkable and unique woman with a passion and love that is unstoppable. She lives intentionally, purposefully and passionately to make the world a better place.This book is so inspiring I intend to read it many times. It's rich with a passion unseen in many people. The cultural aspects expose the reader to life beyond the American armchair. Half-way through the book I found myself searching for and sponsoring a young girl in South Africa through Compassion International. If I can help one young girl aspire and achieve her dreams just as Abegail has done, then my money is following my heart. This story has left a lasting imprint on my heart.Christine AbrahamFounder and Ministry Director  |  WomensBibleCafe

When I bought this at my local grocery store I saw the enticing price and bought three containers. Upon opening the first container I quickly noticed a problem: the packaging! In order to open the package lid, I had to cut away the label and save the measurements on serving size. So I cut around the container label near the bottom of the lid. It's a nuisance.The second packaging problem I had was the "measuring cup" which is actually the lid itself. It's marked with different lines and I filled to the 2-quart line, twice, to make 1 gallon for my kids. The second time I went to make another batch of lemonade, I removed the lid and leftover powder spilled all over my kitchen floor. I wasn't thrilled to mop the floor and get the sticky stuff up before someone tracked it onto our carpeting.Yes, the lemonade has the same great taste as past Country Time products. No, I would not buy it again because the packaging is really frustrating!Package says it makes 32 servings of 8 ounces each.

One of my favorite books to read the summer of 2015 is this book by Amy Lively, How to Love Your Neighbor Without Being Weird. Being the founder of a #BibleCafe I loved the book so much I added it to my Top 10 Favorite Books of 2015 and also pleaded with the author to join her book launch team on Facebook. This book speaks my language about ministering to women in small groups using the gift of hospitality in your communityWhat I like most about this book is the experience and willingness to share Bible study methods that worked and failed in a local community. Amy tackles the most common fears and excuses for leading local studies in your home. She tells the truth about what it required to invest in the lives of your neighbors and to move into your calling.If you want to discover how to obey the Lord's command to love your neighbor then get this book NOW! Amy has literally mapped out the steps you'll want for inviting neighbors, planning your groups and identifying your purpose.I'm in a local leadership group with twelve ministry leaders and I hope they will select this as one of the monthly books for discussion. It's really encouraging and once you finish reading the book you'll get off the sofa and meet those neighbors who walk by your home each day. Pray for your neighbors, love your neighbors and read Amy's book!

Dutch Sheets is a well known and well-respected prayer warrior. In his Authority in Prayer book, he differentiates between the  power or strength to rule and the authority or right to rule. Many times the author references Scripture verses to validate his point. The King James Version, Amplified, Message, and New King James Version are frequently quoted in the book. The author uses numerous examples of praying for our nation, for ministries and for friends.Claiming authority over Satan and winning against spiritual warfare is often not preached in local churches, so I found this a handy reference book. I enjoyed the Authority in Prayer book and Iâ€™ve read it three times. Each time I read the book Iâ€™m convicted of something new. For this reason I have both a printed copy of the book and also a Kindle version for easy reference. The author reminds us that â€œChristâ€™s church would have keys (authority) to lock the gates (government) of hell and release the gate (government) of heavenâ€ (see Matthew 16:19).Sheets is quick to point out that he doesnâ€™t have audible conversations with God. But like many Christians walking in relationship with God, he does â€œtalk to Himâ€ through intentional prayer. Thereâ€™s an interesting lesson on being called as priests, which some religions may disagree or dispute based on their theology. The author shares experiences of modern prophets such as Bill Johnson, Lou Engle, Chuck Pierce and Sandy Grady. If you have a prophetic gifting then this may interest you. Sheet gives examples of intercessory prayer and reminds his readers, â€œMy first thought when seeking direction is to always look in Scriptureâ€¦â€At the end of one chapter there is a lesson on numbers in Scripture, sometimes called â€œBiblical numbers.â€ Skeptics may find the information outside their comfort zone in spite of the associated references from the Bible. The numbers three, five, seven, eight, eleven and twelve and given meaning by Sheets. Some of those meanings are not in alignment with what Iâ€™ve learned through Bible scholars at Liberty University, so Iâ€™d recommend you investigate this further for a better understanding. If youâ€™re not gifted with prophecy, this will probably make you uncomfortable!If you want to know what it would be like for Christians to invade this side of eternity with authority in prayer, then read the book. â€œIf a society remains the same after Christâ€™s church shows up, then the church is not being the church,â€ explains Sheets. After reading the book youâ€™ll most likely grow in boldness with your prayers. Or, if you find the theology makes you too uncomfortable you might toss the book away. Filter the book through prayer and the wisdom of your pastor. Donâ€™t just sit on the sidelines of spiritual warfare.

This is my absolute favorite gift from my husband and kids! The color is fantastic, the size is perfect and the unique style is something I really like.  The artwork attracted my attention and the color shown is true to value. The back of the cup is as pretty as the front. You'll probably want to order this in pairs, as I've discovered everyone in my home wants to "borrow" my special cup!

This is so popular in my home that everyone in my family wants their own Tea Mug! I ordered the mug with the black lid and it arrived in about 10 days. Using this mug, I steeped both Oolong tea with the larger leaves and the smaller teas from the local tea shops. The infuser is easy to use and clean and the size is great for the mug and single-serving portions. The glass mug itself is a thin glass, not study, and feels fragile. I'd prefer a thicker mug-style glass because this thin glass feels like it would break easily. I'm worried about long-term durability of the mug.I had to laugh at the printed instructions: "Put the lid upside down. Put the desired amount of tea into the infuser." Perhaps the assumption is that you would accidentally pour tea over the solid lid!Care Instruction & Warning From Product:Handwash recommendedGlass mug only microwaveable safeLet boiling water settle about 15 to 20 seconds before pouringUse caution when handling hot waterUse baking soda dissolved in warm water to clean tea stain as neededIMPORTANT RETURN POLICY: This very important return policy is included in the product packaging.-unable to accept returns past 30 days-unable to accept return without original packing materials and documentation-cannot refund your original shipping charges unless there was an error on our part

Many microfiber towels snag on skin and have an uncomfortable texture. These towels are not soft and the fiber texture is noticeable. In terms of function, which is more important, these towels soak up the mess! They do not streak and in one swipe the spills are gone. I received the black and grey stripe set. The color was not impressive and lacks style; if I saw these in a local store I would pass them by for their unattractiveness.Material per attached care tag: 80% polyester, 20% PolyamideCleaning Instructions per attached care tag: Machine wash colors separately. COLD WATER GENTLE CYCLE do not bleach tumble dry low.I'm giving this two stars because of the special care instructions (cold water for dish towels) and (gentle cycle). I'd prefer dish towels that can be cleaned in warm or hot water to eliminate kitchen germs. I don't like the black color set or the feel of the towels on my hands.

I installed the device in the dead zone of my home, where we often lose wifi access and noticed an improvement in accessibility for the dead zone. I used the simple method of installation and simply plugged the device into a wall socket. Quickly I discovered the unsecured device on my wifi options list. I changed my installation method and switched the device using the secured password method (user guide available from manufacturer website). Next I performed speed tests on the device (see attached image) using different locations in my home. It surprised me to discover my speed decreased after installing the device and increased again when I removed it from my network.Download speeds with device installed12-17 MbpsUsers at this speed (10-15 Mbps) say they do notice the increase in speed. Web sites drop right into the browser and your interaction with web-based applications and cloud services will be much quicker. Will help you interact with more complex online applications like remote education services, telemedicine and high definition Internet TV. (source Geeksquad dot com)Download speeds when I removed (uninstalled) the device23-27 MbpsIf you have a number of devices connected to your network and want to use them at the same time without delays, this may be the speed (15-50 Mbps) for you. With the explosion of electronic products that can be connected to the Internet, keeping them all working at peak performance is going to be an increasing challenge. Multiple simultaneous connections will require this level of service. (source Geeksquak dot com)

When I started reading The Accidental Feminist: Restoring Our Delight in God's Design by Courtney Reissig I found the book captivating. It's not easy to write about feminism from a Christian perspective as the topic often clashes in understanding and table talk discussions. For this reason, it's a book worth reading! The author recounts her journey out of â€œaccidental feminism,â€ offering wise counsel for Christian women related to relationships, body image, and moreâ€”drawing from the Bible rather than culture. Like many women she was under the influence of a culture pressuring her to conform to the world view rather than the Biblical view of womanhood. How does a recovering feminist fit into the pages of Scripture?Courtney studies the development of the feminist movement and its historical impact on women and society. She explains, "As the culture has evolved, so has the concept of feminism." This alone makes the book worth reading, as she defines feminism as "equality equals sameness." Is this Biblical and how do we apply feminism to our Christian identities? You'll learn the benefits of the first feminist movement in the 1950's and how this changed through the generations to a label challenging modern girls today. "Feminism began as an ideology that promised equality and freedom from the control of men. It has become an ideology that tells women they can use their power, sexuality, and freedom to influence men," writes Courtney.There are some interesting themes in the book and worthy of a small group or book club discussion. Topics include what it means to be a God-designed (and not a man), a talk on submission (makes most women uncomfortable), body image, church and home. You'll see these topics from a feminist view and a Biblical view, and that's worth exploring. What you learn can be shared with the younger generation and remembered by the older women who lived through the first generation of the feminist movement.Educate yourself with these book concepts and then form your own opinion. Get the conversation going in church and at home...this is a topic often ignored in modern Christian culture. Worth reading....more than once!Disclaimer: I received an advanced copy of this book free from the publisher. I was not required to write a positive review and the opinions I have expressed are my own. I am disclosing this in accordance with the Federal Trade Commissionâ€™s 16 CFR, Part 255 : â€œGuides Concerning the Use of Endorsements and Testimonials in Advertising.Christine Abraham  |  WomensBibleCafe

While the monitor is described as a "Gaming" unit, it also functions as a desktop monitor and for use as an Apple TV monitor per the instruction guide. It has an adjustable screen height with tilt feature.Observations:1) the power cord is very short and I had to move the surge protector from the floor to my desktop to use the Monitor2) the Driver install CD would not autorun or operate with Windows 8 on my computer. I was unable to install drivers on the LG website for this product3) the AppleTV connect is easy4) the colors are bright and sharp, no blurring images5) the volume control is difficult to locate and change6) there is no remote control to adjust the volume for Apple TV7) the screen height locking pin on my unit was not functional8) a joystick button the size of a fingernail is located underneath the bottom of the monitor to access the control menusThe color and size of the LG Electronics Gaming 24GM77 24-Inch Screen LED-Lit Monitor are impressive once you have adjusted the menu settings (see number 8 observation). The power cord is too short and the driver would not easily install with Windows 8.Packaged with USB 3.0 cable, DVI-D Dual Cable, D-SUB Cable and power cord.

The Sterling Silver Sky Blue Topaz December Birthstone and White Topaz Halo Heart Earrings, Ring, and Pendant Necklace Jewelry Set is not what I expected, yet still pretty. I am a custom jewelry designer so when I saw the words "sterling  silver" I had the expectation that this would be a nice quality product. Nothing about it resembles the .925 sterling silver that I've worked with as a designer. It's very lightweight and most sterling silver is heavier. In this set, the birthstone is heavier than the metal. There is no authenticity certificate to validate the silver.The heart-shaped ring has a pointed end (bottom of heart) and open edge. It's comfortable to wear. The earrings are pretty and match the set. The necklace has a thin chain with a spring-style clasp. A lobster clasp would be preferred, as spring clasps are more difficult to attach and tend to fall off over time. The pendant is attached with a pretty bail, however it's soldered at the bottom and over time may wear out. The packaging box is low quality, missing a manufacture name as well.You'll want to be careful cleaning the set, although cleaning and care instructions were not included. I use a silver polishing cloth on my jewelry. This product did not arrive tarnished like most silver.The price seems high for the quality, packaging and overall product. I've seen similar items at wholesale bead and jewelry shows for significantly less. This is a pretty set of costume jewelry, not high-quality sterling silver.I'll give it three stars because it's pretty, though the price should be lower to reflect the quality.

I was excited to receive the Cosco The Avery Line 3-Drawer Classic Baby Changing Table, Dark Cherry Finish. When the UPS delivery man dropped off the package, we both observed the weight and size of the box. Since the intended location of my dresser was upstairs, I opened the box downstairs and assembled upstairs because of the weight. The color and finish on the dresser is beautiful, and the height and size sufficient for a changing table. As a dresser, the drawers are smaller than I would prefer for storage. It will hold diapers, creams, blankets and small items.Observations:1) the Styrofoam packaging fell apart as I opened the box and made an enormous mess. Using a stopwatch, I recorded 8 minutes to unpack the box and materials.2) one of the parts (particle board) arrived damaged. It was a decorative piece on the underside of the dresser.3) one of the dresser knobs was missing.4) Assembly time took 4 hours and 22 minutes. I've assembled similar products and this has many assembly parts5) unlike other products, an Allen-wrench is not included. Use your own Philips head screwdriver.6) three of the four legs fell off my unit.7) While the 32-page assembly book has good graphics, it's difficult to discern which screws to use- black or silver, because they are similar in size and shape,I gave the dresser 2 stars because the color and finish are very nice. I deducted three stars because the assembly is too long, the dresser was falling apart before I even used it, and parts were missing. The price is in alignment with the product...if you hire someone to assemble it then four hours of labor would equate to a more expensive "finished" unit. So keep in mind the cost reflects the "unfinished unit" and you'll save on those labor costs if you assemble it yourself. I do have a concern about safety with three legs falling off my unit, so I secured the legs on my unit with Gorilla Super Glue. I'm missing a handle, so I will purchase 6 matching handles at the hardware store.

I bought the original Gorilla Glue because the packaging says "bonds virtually everything: wood, stone, metal, ceramic, foam, glass and more." My intended purpose was to attach a wooden leg to a wooden dresser. I applied the glue and my first observation is that it ran and dripped onto the carpet. I pressed firmly and held the two pieces of wood together, and they would not secure even after a few minutes. Fortunately I bought a second version of Gorilla glue called "Super Glue" and applied using the same method. The Super Glue did not run or drip, I did not need to press firmly as long, and it appears to be holding the wood together. Between the two products, I'd use the "Super Glue" version over theOriginal Gorilla Glue" version.

I bought the original Gorilla Glue because the packaging says "bonds virtually everything: wood, stone, metal, ceramic, foam, glass and more." My intended purpose was to attach a wooden leg to a wooden dresser. I applied the glue and my first observation is that it ran and dripped onto the carpet. I pressed firmly and held the two pieces of wood together, and they would not secure even after a few minutes. Fortunately I bought a second version of Gorilla glue called "Super Glue" and applied using the same method. The Super Glue did not run or drip, I did not need to press firmly as long, and it appears to be holding the wood together. Between the two products, I'd use the "Super Glue" version over the Original Gorilla Glue" version.Update: four hours later when I moved the furniture, the Gorilla Glue was still wet and stuck to my fingers!

Whether you're a blue collar worker, white collar worker, ministry leader, or blogger, Jon Acuff's "Do Over" book is an essential handbook for any career! From the time I first started reading the book it was stuck in my hand and I did not want to put it down. Immediately I started telling family members and friends to read the book. The concepts are simple to implement- yet full of life-long skills.In my print copy of the #DoOver book I've highlighted 90% of the book with marks such as "try this," or "do now" and "quote that." Seriously great book!Acuff's writing style is entertaining and fun to read. This is not a boring career book with dry concepts. His fresh approach includes ideas such as:>> Master the Invisible Skills>> Never Become a Dinosaur>> Grab the Right Hammer for Your Career CeilingHidden behind years of humor and sarcasm is a brilliant mind with equally brilliant concepts. He's authentic, bold, humble and confident as Acuff shares his testimony on intentional career building. I could read this book over and over again (and probably will) and never get bored with it. Kudos to the writer and publisher for a book worthy of the bestsellers list!Christine AbrahamFounder/Ministry Director at Womens Bible Cafe

Before the Amazon shipping box was even opened, I could smell the strong citrus scent of these scrubbing pads. The scent is strong and noticeable! There are several thin pads inside the box and they resemble flattened sponges. In fact, I secretly hoped they would inflate and grow like those little kid toys "fill with water and watch me grow." My scrub (it's not a sponge) remained flat even after running water to wet the surface. This is a very thin kitchen scrub. The cleaning power is powerful, especially on white tile grout. I did all the scrubbing and when finished I was disappointed to find the ends of my fingernails were broken and raw. Again, the scrub is thin. I'm accustomed to using a kitchen sponge with a scrub surface. Once my grout was white and clean, I ran the Clorox Scrub Singles, Kitchen across my tile counters. It's not a sponge, so it left a layer of cleaning product and I needed to use paper towels to wipe away the mess.If you order the Clorox Scrub Singles, Kitchen, Citrus from Amazon I HIGHLY recommend you do NOT order any other items in the shipping box. Food, books, clothing...all of these things packaged with the strong fragrant citrus will most likely absorb the smell. Each time I open my cleaning supply cabinet I can smell these scrubs.I'm undecided to give this two or three stars. It cleans the grout with a bleach-like effect, removing stains. It makes a mess on the smooth surface and I had to use additional towels to wipe away the product. The smell is noticeably strong.

Awesome upgrade to an already great appliance! This George Foreman grill is loaded with features. I especially like the digital temperature and controls. Cleaning is easier than most of my appliances. I followed the instructions and did not use cooking spray on the grills, and it was super easy to clean. Everything I cooked on the grill tastes great. The searing feature sealed the juice and flavor and makes a big improvement to the flavor. I cooked one batch of chicken-apple sausage without the searing feature, and was disappointed. The next time I used the appliance I seared the sausage at 500 degrees, then the temperature automatically drops to 350 degrees. The burgers I cooked were also fantastic, and the drip pan did it's job well. I'm giving it four stars instead of five because:1) There is a plastic smell when first using the appliance, as the temperature heats to 500 degrees there's a noticeable smell or burning plastic. The more I use the appliance the less I notice it, so it seems to be disappearing with use. Since the appliance generates a great deal of steam, I used the center cooking island in my kitchen to protect my cabinets from steam.2) I did manage to burn my fingers the third time I used the appliance. The instructions recommend using oven mitts and after a painful burn, I'm now using them.3) This is a challenging appliance to store in my cabinets. It's wide and bulky, with a plastic exterior. There are two sets of grills (four plates total) plus the drip tray. Make sure you plan ample space to store this when you're not cooking.Great tasting food...you will not be disappointed. Happy Grilling!UPDATE: We are now using this grill several times a week in our home! The food and flavor is much better than on the outside BBQ or the stove. Our favorites are grilled sausages, hamburgers and chicken. The meat is not dry, it cooks faster than the outdoor grill and the flavor is retained.

Fasting For Financial Breakthrough by Dr. Elmer Towns is an excellent teaching on Biblical fasting, rooted in theology not prosperity. This is not a "get-rich" teaching and instead focuses on partnering with God to manage your finances. Upon completing the book I felt a renewed and refreshed attitude towards money. I was so impressed with this teaching that I felt called to lead 500+ women through a 40 Days Financial Fast. After reading this book I learned to:1) Fast and pray according to God's will2) Fast and pray according to Biblical principles3) Fast and pray in faith believing4) Fast and pray in fellowship5) Fast and pray continuously6) Fast and pray to be cleansed of sin barriers7) Fast and pray with a great number of peopleI learned truths about money, financial obligations, self-control and my relationship with God. While I'm a graduate of the Financial Peace University from Dave Ramsey, there are many theological concepts presented by Dr. Towns that are not included in FPU study. Both teachings are worthy of your time and investment!My first exposure to Dr. Elmer Towns was a class on The Gospel of John at Liberty University. There I learned he is co-founder of the University, Dean of the School of Religion and a translator for the New King James Bible. After watching numerous teaching videos and reading his book on the Gospel of John, I was so impressed with his work that I started looking for more books by this Bible scholar. 10 Quotes from Fasting For Financial Breakthrough #TweetThisFasting is a time when we do more than ask for money. It is a time to reexamine our relationship with God. Elmer TownsWhen fasting, we must find God's presence, abide in it and fellowship with Him. Elmer TownsWhen you need faith to trust God for big things, fasting is a great way to develop it. Elmer TownsFaith is putting God's Word into action. We haven't exercised our faith until we've applied God's Word to our problem. Elmer TownsStewardship is the proper management of time, talents and money for the glory of God. Elmer TownsBiblical money management is putting God first, necessities second and pleasures last. Elmer TownsWe don't need to pray long prayers for God to answer. He can hear and respond to the shortest cry for help. Elmer TownsGod often gets our attention through money problems. Elmer TownsJob's greatest wealth was not his money; it was his walk with God. Elmer TownsFasting is the beginning of learning how to get along without things for the sake of God. Elmer Towns*************************Reviewed byChristine AbrahamFounder and Ministry Director at Womens Bible Cafe

Anonymous: Discovering the Somebody You Are to God begins with a personal invitation R.S.V.P. from Cindi Wood, popular Bible teacher and author of the Frazzled Female series. During the six weeks of study, there are lessons for five days of the week. It took me about 20 minutes to complete each daily lesson and it was easy to understand.  Topics include:Week 1: Shades of Anonymous- When You Feel InvisibleWeek 2: The Woman Who Anointed Jesus- When You Are JudgedWeek 3: The Woman with the Issue of Blood- When You Are Tired of HurtingWeek 4: The Woman at the Well- When You Feel OrdinaryWeek 5: The Woman Who Committed Adultery- When You Are Burdened with ShameWeek 6: Rhythm of Grace New Name, New IdentityThe first week begins with an introduction to feeling invisible. The next four weeks you'll meet "Judged" in the house of the Pharisee; "Hurting" near the shores of the Sea of Galilee; "Ordinary" by the well in Samaria; and finally, in Jerusalem's temple courtyard, you'll meet "Shame." Perhaps you've met Judged, Hurting, Ordinary and Shame...or maybe these are identities you've experienced sometime in your life. Upon completion of this study you'll see them through the eyes of Jesus.The writing style is conversational and easy to follow as Cindi Wood shares stories from her experiences teaching middle school children and overcoming clinical depression. You'll like the pleasant personality of the author as she falls in love with her readers!****************************************************10 Quotes from Anonymous: Discovering the Somebody You Are to God #TweetThisHaving a relationship with Jesus Christ dispels every other identity that holds you hostage. Cindi WoodGod does not define you by your current or past struggle. He defines you by who you are in Him. Cindi WoodSometimes the best words are those spoken within the heart. Cindi WoodThose who follow Jesus cannot be snatched out of His saving hand. To suggest so casts doubt on the safe grasp of our Savior. Cindi WoodGod does not want any of His children to live an unfulfilled life. Cindi WoodJesus never forces anyone to seek and receive what He has to offer. He simply provides the opportunity to do so. Cindi WoodGod allows in each of our lives earthly experiences to teach us spiritual truths. Cindi WoodMercy is best described as God's attitude toward those who are in distress. Cindi WoodWhen you come to Jesus, He's always full of compassion to embrace you. His love is unconditional and steady. Cindi WoodIf you'll let Him, Christ will turn your trembling into triumphing. He longs to encourage you in your faith and communication with Him. Cindi Wood*************************Blessings,Christine AbrahamFounder and Ministry Director at Womens Bible Cafe

This seemed like a good solution to replace my Comcast device, since Comcast has raised the monthly rental fee to $15 per month. It took 45 minutes on the phone with Comcast to get the modem operational from their end. As I was installing this I saw the power cord connector was loose on the modem and I appeared to have a defective unit. From the day I installed it, I started losing internet service daily, about the same time each day. When my neighborhood had a 30-second power surge today and lost power for less than a minute, the device went down completely and it took about 10 minutes to reboot itself. Frustrating to have a modem without battery back-up even for 30 seconds! I purchased a replacement unit (still in box) and after one week of frustration both units- the original defective unit and the replacement unit- will be returned.

It's hard to find school snacks for my teenage daughters and they really LOVE the flavor in these granola bars. It satisfies both the sweet tooth and the salty tooth...just as the product is described. At the grocery store the flavors all look the same..so it helps when my kids identify the EXACT flavor they prefer. I've discovered they do NOT like the Sweet & Salty Peanut flavor, or the Sweet & Salty Peanut Dark Chocolate Peanut & Almond flavor. The exact flavor they like is this one: Chocolate Pretzel Nut. I have several unopened packages of the other flavors and the kids beg me to buy more of their preferred one. Although the bar is small, it fills them up at snack time until they come home from school.Nutrition Facts per package label: 150 calories, 5g fat, 2g saturated fat, 0g trans fat, omg cholesterol, 160mg sodium, 24g carbs, 2g fiber, 12g sugar, 2g protein.

When I decided to return to the health club after an absence, I asked my fitness friends which earbuds they liked best. Many of them suggested the Yurbuds Inspire Sport Earphones for women. They arrived quickly with Amazon Prime shipping and I discovered great sound, lightweight comfort and an excellent fit. They stayed secure as I worked on several weight machines, the elliptical and the stationary bike. The overall length of the cord is great for exercise machinesâ€¦not too long and not too short either. I especially like the secure fit in my iPhone earphone jack, because the Apple earbuds always fall out! I did find the cord twisted frequently and I have not yet resolved this frustration. If you have tips on keeping the cord from twisting, please post a comment below. I'm very impressed with the Yurbuds Inspire Sport Earphones and would buy them again should my teen daughters suddenly "borrow" themâ€¦a common problem in my home. #CaliforniaMom

The  Harney and Sons Decaf Hot Cinnamon , Decaf...is  bold in flavor, with a strong cinnamon taste. It's actually stronger in flavor than the caffeinated teabag version. This sachet tea is very strong, so if you like spicy teas or chai teas then this is the right tea for you! Add a little steamed milk if you prefer, or drink it plan. It has a bit of a sweet taste so sugar is unnecessary. Experiment with the steeping time and water temperaturesâ€¦.you'll have a different experience when you do.I like this so much that I would buy it again and also give to a friend as a gift. When I'm dining out I carry the tea bags in my handbag, order a pot of hot water, and sip my favorite beverage! It also tastes great iced for hot California summers. Spicyâ€¦boldâ€¦and sweet!

0:43 Mins The Black & Decker EHC3002B Glass Bowl Chopper (black) that I tested was disappointing. Following the instruction guide, I assembled the product easily: I put the chopper blade in the bowl, attached the plastic safety lid, attached the motor. Following these instructions I made the Spinach Artichoke Dip on page 7 in the instruction guide. The appliance did not chop or blend the ingredients well and I transferred to a mini food chopper to complete the job. On another test, I used almond butter, honey, coconut and coconut oil....once again the appliance did not chop well so I transferred them to another device to complete the job. These ingredients in the second test were soft and should have chopped well. The ingredients in the first test were thawed spinach and thawed artichoke hearts, following page 7 in the instruction guide.My Observations:1) This is like a power drill on a salad bowl. Sounds like a power drill or a dentist's drill (please see attached video)!2) The chopper blade sits unattached inside the glass bowl, and is attached to the "power drill" motor at the top.3) The appliance did not chop the food4) The glass bowl does not have handles, so removing the hot glass from the oven is a challenge even wearing two oven mitts.I would not personally buy this for myself or give as a gift to a friend. Rather, I would select a mini-chopper with blade attached to the base unit. The Cuisinart DLC-2ABC Prep Plus Food Processor, Mini, did chop the ingredients after they were unchopped on this appliance.

Mere Christianity by C. S. Lewis is one of his most famous books. The book is a based upon a series of radio talks during the World War, with additional elaborations and wisdom from Mr. Lewis. His understanding of theology is deep yet practical, and not swayed by any particular denomination. Clearly he dislikes argumentative Christians and his book focus is to teach the basics without conflict. He writes, "This book, then, does not consist of academic philosophical musings. Rather, it is a work of oral literature, addressed to people at war." His original audience consisted of men and women who might not live another day, and he purposed to encourage them and bring them into faith. A former atheist, Mr. Lewis simplifies the core concepts of Christianity and argues for the benefits of having a faith rooted in Christ,I found this book a pure delight to read, and will most likely read it again a few years from now. The use of imagery to explain theology is a powerful teaching tool. It's a refreshing and unique approach, with words flowing from the heart of the author. He simplifies what others tend to complicate. One of my favorite chapters is when he explains why some Christians can be un-Christian in their actions towards others. The words are powerful, convicting and written in love.************************10 Quotes From Mere Christianity #TweetThisIf the universe is not governed by an absolute goodness, then all our efforts are in the long run hopeless. C. S. LewisGod is the only comfort, He is also the supreme terror: the thing we most need and the thing we most want to hide from. C. S LewisHuman beings judge one another by their external actions. God judges them by their moral choices. C. S LewisEveryone says forgiveness is a lovely idea, until they have something to forgive. C. S LewisPride is essentially competitiveâ€”is competitive by its very nature. C. S LewisIf you think you are not conceited, it means you are very conceited indeed. C. S LewisWhen you are behaving as if you loved someone, you will presently come to love him. C. S LewisNo man knows how bad he is till he has tried very hard to be good. C. S LewisWhen we Christians behave badly, or fail to behave well, we are making Christianity unbelievable to the outside world. C. S LewisIt is when I turn to Christ, when I give myself up to His Personality, that I first begin to have a real personality of my own. C. S. Lewis************************

Keep It Shut: What to Say, How to Say It, and When to Say Nothing at All by Karen Ehman begins with endorsements from well-known leaders in Christian ministry. The book is endorsed by:LysaTerKeurstLiz Curtis HiggsCandace Cameron BureJim DalyJennifer SmithCourtney JosephJennifer RothschildRouth SoukupDarlene SchachtRenee SwopeSally ClarksonThe message of the book is aligned with Scripture, as Karen Ehman teaches the fine art of holding your tongue and silencing yourself. While it may seem like common sense, in a social media world where our voices are heard in further distances, it's critical to realize what to say, when to say it and when to keep it shut!Karen shares personal stories with humility and love. She invites her readers to identify with "foot in the mouth" situations and offers alternatives to unhealthy situations.Learn the art of listening, speaking with grace, and cultivating a new language of communication. Read this as a Book Club selection, a Bible study, or as a self-help book if you struggle with either side of the communication fence. May you be blessed by this Karen Ehman book!***********************************10 Quotes From Keep It Shut #TweetThisWhen we lace our words with grace, healing happens. Karen EhmanDon't say something permanently painful just because you are temporarily ticked off. Karen EhmanListening requires attending to the other person's heart. Karen EhmanTalking to God helps me know how to talk to others. Karen EhmanTreat your time alone with God as serious as any other appointment you have. Karen EhmanI like to think of the book of Proverbs as the Twitter of the Old Testament. Such snappy sayings and crisp quotes.  Karen EhmanWhen it comes to our speech, both motives and manners matter. Karen EhmanWe must be diligent to weigh our own hearts and actions but give grace to others who speak ill of us. Karen EhmanIf you're tempted to slam someone online, brag on Facebook or send off a nasty tweet, turn off the screen & walk away! Karen EhmanPassing on hearsay is repeating something w/out verification. You could be passing on the truth or you could be spreading a lie.Karen Ehman************************Reviewed by:Christine AbrahamFounder and Ministry Director at Womens Bible Cafe

I was disappointed when my Mavea water pitcher started leaking with this filter. The Aqua Optima Evolve is taller than the Mavea filter slot, and this caused leakage in my pitcher. Since the water is BELOW the top of the filter, it sits inside the reservoir and will not drain. When I pour from my Mavea pitcher into my tea kettle, water spills down the side of the pitcher and makes a mess on the counter. In terms of function, this does not fit the Mavea as advertised. In terms of taste, the water tastes pure and without the bitterness or chemical flavor of some water filter products. I have included photos for comparison. You will notice the distinct height difference between the Mavea filter and the Aqua Optima Evolve Filter.Also, another reviewer said her Aqua filter is made in China. I looked on the packaging of the Aqua Otima Evolve which I received from Amazon and the product is marked "British Technology and Design" and the manufacturer address listed is "British Isles."

I have a one-eyed dog who struggles with night blindness, so I keep night lights in the house to prevent him from walking into furniture. My previous night light would automatically turn on at night and go off in the morning, so I decided to buy something similar. When the Maxxima MLN-09 LED Night Lights arrived, I noticed the cheap quality and design. Opening the lens cover and looking inside the light fixture I observed a very tiny light, equal to something you'd find in a battery-operated tea light set. The lightbulb is smaller than an eraser head on a pencil. Yet in spite of it's tiny size, the bulb has a powerful effect. It produces a blue glow with a geometric pattern. In my small laundry room, it's too bright and the pattern is distracting. In my family room, the room is larger so the brightness is less intense. Personally, I like my former nightlight much better and would not repurchase the Maxxima MLN-09 LED Night Light.

These are a favorite family snack and satisfy our chocolate cravings. It's not overly sweet, yet enough chocolate flavor to blend nicely with the crunchy almond inside. The packaging is easy to open and well-designed. Ingredients: dark chocolate (chocolate liquor, sugar, cocoa butter, vanilla), almonds, Gum Acacia from acacia tree, sugar, confectioner's glaze. The Storm Inside: Trade the Chaos of How You Feel for the Truth of Who You Are by Sheila Walsh is not another victim book nor a depressing autobiography. It's a book about YOU and once you open the pages and read the message inside, you'll realize it's written on your behalf. In her book Sheila addresses these ten feelings that can become overwhelming burdens:>> Heartache>> Disappointment>> Fear>> Bitterness>> Unforgiveness>> Anger>> Regret>> Abandonment>> Shame>> InsecuritySheila calls them the "ten chaotic feelings that tend to paralyze us" and walks you through a solution to these frustrating burdens. By the time you finish the book you will feel lightened from your burdens.I enjoyed reading The Storm Inside: Trade the Chaos of How You Feel for the Truth of Who You Are by Sheila Walsh. I especially enjoyed the ministry stories about women who reached out to Sheila for encouragement during their own times of pain and darkness. The book is filled with wisdom and based on truth of Scripture. Highly recommend reading one chapter a night before bed!******************************************************10 Quotes From The Storm Inside #TweetThisBefore we can embrace the good news of the love of God, we have to deal with the truth of who we are without Him. Sheila WalshGod is in the business of reviving ordinary women like you and me, and teaching us how to live with courage and passion. Sheila WalshWords cut deep, and none cut deeper than those from a parent. Sheila WalshSo long as we live on this earth, our human dreams will never live up to their preview. Sheila WalshLike Saul, we get to choose: will we fall on our own sword or fall on the mercy of God? Sheila WalshSatan cannot follow us beyond this life. Sheila WalshCountless lives have been ruined or put on hold because of someone's refusal to forgive. Sheila WalshForgiveness is not about removing someone else's liability, but about setting our own hearts free. Sheila WalshNo one can take away your identity as a royal daughter. Sheila WalshGod's plan continues to unfold even when it feels out of control. Sheila Walsh

We've been using the  Brita pitcher  for many years and with the California drought our water started tasting really disgusting! I was excited to find this new pitcher and it has everything I wanted. Most important is taste, and this pitcher improves the taste of drought water significantly! Second, the pitcher has a really unique way of filling with water. IN the previous  Brita pitcher  I used, it was necessary to remove the lid each time I filled with water. On this device, there is a "water flap" at the top of the pitcher. Simply place the pitcher under your faucet and when the water runs the flap opens automatically. When the reservoir is full,, the water flap automatically closes.The one drawback to this pitcher is the weight. The 9-cup is top heavy...and little children hands or people with weaker hands would have a hard time lifting the pitcher. When the pitcher is full, I need to carry it with two hands.I am pleased with this pitcher, it tastes better than my previous brand, it's easy to use and I save money on bottled water. each member of my family uses the  Camelbak Eddy Bottle (1-Liter/32-Ounce) and we refill it using our filtered water. Less expensive that buying bottled water!

Maxwell explores key traits and leadership styles from  Elijah, Elisha, Job, Jacob, Deborah, Isaiah, Jonah, Joshua and Daniel.
