4:27 MinsI am a knitter, I learned about a year ago and picked it up very quickly and love it.  I recently have started doing patterns that require me to crochet a little, so since I'm not an avid crocheter I didn't need an elaborate set but this set is more than enough to get me going.This comes in a nice case with multiple hooks, stitch markers, plastic needles, a row/stitch counter, a stitch holder and yarn snips. Even as a knitter I use all of these things except the hooks so they're all good to have. I will say that I'm not a fan of the plastic needles because they bend easily and I think they're harder to use while weaving in ends. I also am not a fan of this type of stitch counter but if it is all you have it is way better than pen and paper. If you are a beginner these are all things you are going to want when starting out.As far as the hooks go they are comfortable but I had read other reviewers saying that the sizing is wrong so I got out my hook/needle sizer to check them and they do seem off. It is possible that I'm using my sizer wrong because I only know how to check for needle sizes but you will see in the video. I assume that crocheting like knitting has gauges so if you check your gauge (which you should) if the hook is wrong you can account for that.Because of the sizing issue and the plastic needles I would say this might be a kit that is better suited for teen or younger girls who want to learn the basics of crocheting and need a starter set. However, I also think it will suit my needs just fine considering knitting is still my preferred method.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

1:16 MinsFirst I have to say that I love the green color of this toilet bowl brush. I'm drawn to that color lately and this is nice and shiny and bright and it is great. (Sorry, I'm a designer, it's the little things.)The base of this has sort of a cat eye shape which fit in the corner of my bathroom very well and it is a unique design which I appreciate. The base comes in two parts, not 100% sure the reasoning for this but I'm inclined to say it is for easier cleaning but I could be wrong. When you put the brush in the base it looks concealed so you can't see the brush at all but there is a slight gap around the edges to keep it from mildewing.I was concerned that the black ring on the brush was going to be an issue while cleaning but it wasn't at all, it actually almost worked as a shield to keep water from splashing towards me which I appreciate. I felt like the handle on the brush could have been a little bit stronger. It had a little bit of give and I have a very old toilet so I tend to push pretty hard when I scrub it.Overall though it is nice. Unique design, great color, if the handle was a little more rigid this would easily have been 5 stars.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

2:00 MinsI had higher hopes for this shower curtain. It is pretty and there is a little bit of shimmer in the "pebble" pattern so that is a plus. When you first take it out of the package there is no scent at all, usually they have an overpowering vinyl scent which takes a while to air out. It is nice that this comes with plastic shower curtain rings, I already have rings so I won't be using those but it is good to have if you're just starting out. I also am a fan of the metal grommets around the holes, this keeps the curtain from ripping. I've always liked clear shower curtains because I, like most people, do not have a light in my shower and it is quite dark in there which may be a good thing because my shower is old and disgusting. :-)The length and width on this are fantastic, there was coverage on either side of my shower and the length was longer than the curtain I had previously.Here is where the curtain falls short. It is very thin. I've had quite a few different shower curtains over the years and I thought at the price point for this product this one would have been thicker. That being said I don't see where that affects its ability to keep water out, it did a perfectly fine job of that. The biggest problem I have with this is that there are no weights or suction cups at the bottom. I mention this is the video part of this review and sure enough when we used it the shower curtain would slowly gravitate towards us which I find icky. At first it's not a big deal but shower curtains do eventually get gross and then if it touches me, eww. For now I'll probably just add a couple of pennies to the bottom to fix that but please be aware of that. If that sort of thing doesn't both you or you are planning on using this on the outside of your tub (not sure why but to each their own) then you shouldn't have an issue.Otherwise I think it's a pretty shower curtain that isn't girly or masculine and would suit a variety of decors; I just wish it was thicker and/or had something to keep it from moving around.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

5:11 MinsWow! I already have a set of hiking poles or at least I thought I did because now I'm giving those to my daughter because they are nothing compared to this set.Honestly it is too cold for hiking right now so I haven't had my chance to test these out in the woods but I will update this review if I notice any issues at all with these but I don't anticipate it because these are impressive right out of the gate. For me it is important that the handles are comfortable because I do rely on my hiking poles a lot. I'm a klutz and without my poles I'm guaranteed to fall down on a hike just ask my family. Not only are the handles comfortable but the wrist straps are nice and soft as well, also a requirement.Like my other set the measurements on these are in cm and I am in the states so I'm use to inches, I don't know if that is a standard thing for hiking sticks because I only have this set and my other set to compare them to. These slide very easily and lock very tightly so I don't have to worry about them coming apart on me if they get stuck in the mud, and they will get stuck in the mud. When these are closed up they are a total of 27" long so they will store nicely in our camper.These are both rigid and anti shock and they impressively made. I can not wait to get out and hike our local stateparks during the next camping season. My kids are getting my old hiking poles because mommy is officially hiking in style.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

I will say that for the couple of days that I had this on our litter pan it worked great. Unfortunately for us our new kitten has found out how to get these off of her litter pan and destroy them. We have a round litter pan and I've never liked the way the filter fits on top and although these were slightly larger than the ones that came with the pan I could have stood for them to be about an inch longer.As for our crazy cat it doesn't matter what we do she find a way to get them. I had only used one and left the other one in the package in another room up on a cabinet and after destroying the one on her litter pan she proceeded to find the one I hadn't used and try to destroy that as well. Thankfully these are only a couple of dollars because they have essentially become a kitten chew toy that I have to take away from her before she hurts herself.If your cat is not insane like ours is and will leave these alone they do work quite well, we could not smell our stinky little furball's messes when it was on. :-)

3:28 MinsI'm beyond impressed with this cat activity tree. I recently got a rescued "kitten" for my birthday after my 16 year old cat passed away. I've had 3 cats before my current one but this one (her name is Helvetica) is by far the most spoiled and she is the first one I've gotten a cat tree for.Part of the reason that I never got one before is because I knew I wanted one in our living room but as a past Interior Designer I knew I didn't want the typical carpet covered monstrosity in my living space. I saw this PetFusion cat tree and knew it was the one for me. First thing I was drawn to was its modern design. I'm a fan of all things modern and not only does this have the clean lines of a modern piece it also has an Asian inspired feel to it and the two styles work perfectly together.When this arrived I was first surprised at how heavy it is, it weighs approximately 30 pounds and it is solid. The wood has a beautiful cherry finish that works great in my space. The fuzzy pieces are so soft that my 10 year old says she wants to live in them. :-)This was very easy to put together and it includes the hardware and the allen wrench. My daughter (again she's 10) helped me and if you're a mother you know how well kids help. The directions say that you should have two people to set this up and it would be quite difficult to do it alone but not completely impossible. Between my daughter and I we had it together in less than 10 minutes. It might have taken less time but my kitten decided to "help" us.Not only do you get this beautiful piece of pet furniture the company also sent along a spray bottle of catnip essential oil to spray on it. I put a couple squirts on and my cat loved it.I am absolutely impressed with the quality and design of this product. It is durable, functional and beautiful and there's not a lot of pet products you can say that about.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review but that in no way swayed the above statements, wonderful product!

8:41 MinsWe have tried out quite a few quadcopters now and this one by far is the most unique and according to my husband it is very fun to use.I'm going to try my best to tell you about this product and I have included a video of it in action too. I apologize for the fact that the video isn't very clear in parts but we got this for my daughter for Christmas and she was outside playing when we filmed this. We also weren't able to get very good video from the quadcopter for the same reason but the little bit we did get was nice and clear.OK, disclaimer out of the way here's some information about this Hawkeye Quadcopter.It is smaller than other quadcopters we've tried (I have it packed away for Christmas now but I think it think it was under 5" square)It is powerful, this is quite fastIt doesn't just fly, it drives too which is super cool.There are multiple set up options including standard quadcopter without blade guards, with blade guards, 4 small wheels or 2 large wheels (my husband said this was the funnest set-up). The large wheels make this better for beginners because the blades can't hit anything and the quadcopter is fairly protected in there. You can fly it with all these setups so even though it has wheels on it you can still fly it or switch it over and drive it.The battery on this seemed to last longer than our other quadcopters but we'll still get extras. Nothing is more frustrating than playing with your quadcopter and the battery dies and you have to wait at least a couple of hours for it charge. There is a USB battery charger cable included that turns red when it is charging.This comes with a 4GB card for filming video and a USB adaptor to get the video on your computerThe controller is (according to my husband) the best one he's used. He says it feels like a video game controller.The controller does require (4) AAA batteries which are not includedI'm sure there's more information I'm forgetting but a lot of it is in the video. Like I said this is stashed away until Christmas but if after that anything else turns up I will update this review.So far I know our daughter will be thrilled to have her own quadcopter until her dad takes it for his own. :-)I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

3:15 MinsI did a video review for these after only quickly opening them to make sure they weren't damaged and you will hear me in the review in disbelief that these are wooden, it's hard to believe, these are soooo cool and they're super light weight.These come in a nice hard case and they also come with a pretty large microfiber cleaning cloth. When I opened up the case I was super impressed with these right off the bat.  I got these for my daughter for Christmas because she is always trying to steal my sunglasses and I'm hoping because these are made of wood they will last her a while and she won't break them.I tried these on to see how well they fit and they are very comfortable, they actually fit me perfectly. Also, because they are so light weight I couldn't barely tell they were on. The lenses on these are not polarized but they are nice and dark.Overall, just the fact that these are wood makes them cool but even if they weren't they're a very nice pair of sunglasses. Maybe I'll get lucky and she won't like them and I'll get to keep them. :-)I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

I really hope that my daughter likes this and if she doesn't I know that I will have no problem finding someone who will, and that someone is me. :-)I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

It is possible that I'm using my sizer wrong because I only know how to check for needle sizes but you will see in the video. I assume that crocheting like knitting has gauges so if you check your gauge (which you should) if the hook is wrong you can account for that.Because of the sizing issue and the plastic needles I would say this might be a kit that is better suited for teen or younger girls who want to learn the basics of crocheting and need a starter set. However, I also think it will suit my needs just fine considering knitting is still my preferred method.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

1:42 MinsI quite like this Jewelry Organizer. I love the design of the silhouette of the tree with the little bird, it is a style that will go with a lot of different decors.I got this for my daughter for Christmas. She is getting older and not as interested in toys but interested in jewelry and clothes and in an attempt at keeping her room slightly clean I thought she would like this (I have to wait a couple of months to know for sure). I know I would like it if I received this as a gift. This is made of a rigid plastic material that I prefer over metal because I know it will hold up over time. It comes in two pieces that easily snap together. There is tons of room for earrings (I'm counting 30 different pair holes), necklaces, rings, watches etc.  Overall dimensions of this at the widest points are 13.5"H x 9.25"W  and the base is 6.5".I really hope that my daughter likes this but on the off chance that she doesn't I'm keeping it. :-)I received this discounted product for my honest and unbiased review.

1:30 MinsI have a lot of wind chimes (I think we're close to 20 on our property now). My husband has been collecting them for as long as we have been together so I have a lot to compare this set to. This are quite lovely, I am especially pleased with the amber colored glass diamond detail on the bottom. I had no problems with these being bent or damaged in any way, I took them out of the box and hung them up without issue.I have to admit that I am spoiled because I have very expensive wind chimes that are tuned to specific notes and sound like church bells so by comparison these sound slightly tinny to me but that pretty much means that they sound like a typical wind chime in this price range. In my house the chimes themselves look black but outside they looked almost bronze so I'm not 100% sure what the finish color is on these, black or bronze they'll match everything. The longest tube on these is 14" and thanks to their clean design they will look great with any style home.I would have no problem giving these as a gift to someone who likes wind chimes. Despite the fact that they are not as elegant of a sound as my super expensive wind chimes they are still peaceful and soothing and everything that everyone loves about wind chimes.I received this discounted product for my honest and unbiased review.

1:42 MinsI love all things vintage and this bath mat shows some of my favorite things. This is quite large 36" x 23.5" so you will have plenty of room to stand on when you get done showering but I actually got it to put by my back door. The main reason for this is that we have a hot tub and I wanted something soft and that could get wet for when we come in from the hot tub. We've just been using a towel and it was driving me nuts; this is perfect.The colors on this are very vivid, I'm sure my video of them does not do them justice. The rug itself is very soft to the touch and cushioned when you step on it. The back is slip resistant/water resistant. I'm debating on whether the stereo or the TV are my favorite things on here, of course I am fond of all the items on this mat and even have a few of them.I will have to see how this holds up over time. My animals love it so I'm hoping my new kitten doesn't ruin it. The only thing that I am still debating if it is a bad thing or not is when you rub the mat one way you can see the white on the other side of the print (typical of microfiber), obviously the print looks better solid but when you the white is showing it actually looks a little more vintage so I can go either way on that but I wanted to mention it.Overall, I love the subject matter and the feel of this, it is perfect for what I wanted it for.I received this discounted product for my honest and unbiased review.

2:31 MinsWhile camping this summer my daughter kept commenting whenever she saw a hammock and would say how cool it would be to have one. When I was a kid I always wanted one in my room so I thought this would be the perfect Christmas present for her. She has a loft bed that we built for her years ago and while she was at school we checked it out and this is going to fit perfectly under her bed, on top of that the colors are the same colors as her bed so, go me.I can't attest to how supportive this is because I can't put this up until Christmas or it will kind of ruin the surprise because I think she would notice this in her room. However, I did take it out of the bag and take a quick video of it so that I could at least show everyone what it looks like up close. The material of this is softer than what I had anticipated by looking at it. The ropes to hold it are installed very well and look very strong. There are ropes included to hang this with and everything comes in a matching bag that I will probably stuff and sew up so that she has a matching pillow for her hammock. Basically the only thing that I am going to need to install this in her room is hooks that will hold it.I can not wait to surprise my daughter with this for Christmas. I can already picture her hanging out in her hammock reading and listening to music, honestly I'm jealous. On top of all that when summer comes we can always take it outside and hook it up or even take it camping with us. I hope she likes it. I plan I updating this review after Christmas with pictures of it installed and I will also note anything else of interest I find once it is in use. As of right now it seems very well made and I'm very happy with this, I hope my daughter is too.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

2:55 MinsHow cool is this pitcher?! I love all things modern and I saw this pitcher a while ago and loved the design of it. When it arrived I was equally impressed. Even the handle reminds me of the modern hardware you see on kitchen cabinets and I would love to host a dinner party just so I could offer people drinks poured out of this.This pitcher holds approximately 5 cups of fluids (that's a little over 1 Liter). I really like the piece at the spout that keeps your ice from coming out while pouring drinks. I hate when ice plops into a freshly poured glass and makes a mess.The exterior of this pitcher does not show smudges and has a very minimal brushed quality to it. I did not see any rust on the interior like a saw another review mention so that might have been a fluke; as I matter of fact I see no blemishes at all with my pitcher.If you know anyone who loves modern design and clean simple lines this is the perfect drink pitcher for them. This would make a great gift especially for Christmas or for a new homeowner. I know I would have been thrilled to receive this as a gift. I could always use a second one (hint, hint) :-DI received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

2:10 MinsAwesome clock, I love the vivid green color; it in a nice contrast against my sapphire colored bathroom walls. The numbers are easy to read as are the hands since they stand out so well against the green background. The (what seems like) brushed aluminum compliments the clock color perfectly.I am a fan of modern and minimalist design and I am also a big fan of color especially in my bathroom. I'm not a morning person so I like bright colors to greet me first thing in the morning to get me in a good mood. This clock certainly falls in that category.This clock is silent, I can not hear it working at all no matter how hard I try so if you are a fan of the tick-tock of a clock this is not the one for you. It requires (1) AA battery which is not included. So far this keeps very good time and since I'm using it in bathroom that is where I need it to keep good time so I'm not late in the morning.I am curious to see how well the metal holds up in my damp bathroom but it will take years to see if that is an issue so for now I couldn't be happier with this clock; great color and a great look and does its job.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

3:30 MinsWhile camping this summer I realized I didn't have a sewing kit in our camper and I really needed one when my son's favorite stuffed animal needed "surgery" due to a small hole. Luckily I knit so I had a small needle and thread in my knitting kit but now his favorite monkey has noticeably gray stitches.  Right then I realized I needed a sewing kit in our camper.This kit will do the job. I only have a couple of issues with this but for the main part it is very nice. It is compact which is exactly what I need in our camper. The zipper on the kit is smooth. When you open it there are two needle threaders in there that feel kind of flimsy so I don't see them lasting very long which is a shame because you are going to need them to thread the needles as they have very small eyes on them. Otherwise the rest of the kit is great, there are (3) white buttons, a safety pin, small scissors, (2) pins, a seam ripper, multiple colors of thread and the thread is nice and thick and fairly easy to unwind, a measuring tape and a thimble.Ultimately this will be perfect for any mending I might need to do while camping including stuffed animal surgeries. :-)  Also, if you only do minimal sewing/mending or you know someone who is just starting out in an apartment this is a handy little kit to have or give.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

3:14 MinsThis is the second expansion pack I have been able to try out and this one was far superior to the previous pack I tried and I thought the one I previously tried was great. If you are a fan of Cards Against Humanity you know that there are a few cards that if you play them, no matter what you are going to get the judge's vote, now imagine a pack where almost all of the cards are those types of cards; this is that pack.This Guards Against Insanity set is so bad and I mean that in the best possible way. It is in fact so bad that I barely had any choices of cards to show on my review that would not instantly need to be censored. My neighbors, my husband and I played this Halloween night and could not stop laughing, we were all in a constant state of shock of what we just read and laughing uncontrollably . I also played this with my parents (my dad loves cards against humanity) and I haven't heard my parents laugh that hard in a very long time.If you have a wonderfully horrible sense of humor and you are not easily offended or better yet if you almost never offended you are going to love this expansion pack. Everyone who has played this with me has commented on how great it is. I look forward to future editions from this company.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review but that in no way swayed the above statements, hilarious!

1:46 MinsThis is a very handy cable case that has a ton of pockets, right when you think there couldn't possibly be any more pockets, boom, there's another pocket.We got this to put in our camper because we noticed we have a lot of electrical devices in our camper and they all have cords and this is compact enough to hold them all and keep us organized. The fact that this is yellow is also great because it is harder to lose in the mess that becomes our camper after a few days. I will say that some of the pockets are kind of tight and I'm not sure what we will be able to put in them but I'm sure we'll find something.I have included a video of this so that you can see all the different pockets in it and get an idea of everything that it can hold. I know personally this organization will last about a week before everyone just starts randomly throwing stuff in it and zipping it up, but hey it's worth a shot. :-)Overall, if you like to be organized you can't get much more organized than putting all of your stuff in this handy, pocket filled case.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

1:42 MinsI loved the look of this credit card/ business card holder right off the bat. This is clean lined and classic and great for any gender, it even has a vintage feel that I am fond of. I got the black case and I got it for my husband. He has always carried around a ridiculously large wallet (it's my fault, I got it for him as a gift one year). He got into the habit of carrying a lot of stuff in it and when it started to fall apart we couldn't find another ridiculously large wallet so he had to down size. Now we keeps a case in his backpack or vehicle and then the most important stuff in his wallet. Go figure. I thought that the double wallets was overkill and he should at least have something nice to keep those cards in other than an old wallet especially since all he needs are the card holders on the oversized wallet.I know that this is sold as a credit card case but this has 24 slots so it could easily be used just for photos or for business cards (which is what I would use it for) or anything else that you would need to carry with you that you don't want to take up a ton of room. This is approximately 4" x 3" so it is not much bigger than a business card. There are two snaps on it so that it can extend if you have a lot of stuff in it.Overall this seems very well made and I really like the quality of this. I think it would make a great gift.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

2:57 MinsThis is a very nice leather portfolio (padfolio) that only has a couple of minor issues.I love the contrasting details on this. it is classy yet the contrast implies a bit of sophistication. As much as I like the metal detail on the front I can see where it will be an issue if you're a perfectionist because it does smudge very easily.The zipper on this is nice and smooth and there are plenty of pockets to hold business cards, ID, brochures, even a tablet. There is also a spot for a pen or two (word of advice, always carry at least 2 pens). There is a built in calculator that can come out but I'm worried that over time this will come out whether you want it to or not but I could be wrong. This also includes a lined note pad to get you started that can easily be replaced once you use all the paper in it.When I was an Interior Designer (before kid number 2) I used my portfolio for every business meeting and if I didn't have it with me I was lost. This would make a great gift for anyone starting their own business or just getting out of college or high school or in my case for my husband who is a graphic/web designer who occasionally needs to meet with clients in person.No matter what this is a professional case that will make you feel proud every time you take it out to use it.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.
My almost 4 year old son is obsessed with this show and I'm perfectly ok with that. He's learning things I didn't even know about animals. It's educational and is fun and my little boy loves it.

2:21 MinsI got these for my mom; she has a small mom and pop shop and she recently got an iPad air 2 to run their credit card purchased on and so she needed a stylus. She was going to buy some of these at the local office supply store for twice the price and I told to wait and I would look online.I tested these on my iPad 2 and had no issues with the stylus working. The stylus itself is a little squishy so I don't know if that is a problem because I honestly don't use them that often but I figured I would mention it just in case.These come in great colors that are perfect for my mom's store because she has a ton of stuff so if it blends in consider it lost.The best thing about these is that they aren't just a stylus, they are a pen too and not just a pen, they're a really nice pen. I took one out and went to test it thinking that I would have to scribble a little before it would work and it worked smoothly right out of the gate. (These are black ink in case you're wondering).I have no complaints with this product but I have yet to get them to my mom to see how she feels. If she feels any differently about them I will update this review.I received this discounted product for my honest and unbiased review.

1:52 MinsI really had high hopes for the headphones. My husband recently started going to the gym again and wanted a set of headphones that he could use while working out, these seemed like a good option.First the sound quality is good so that is not an issue. What is an issue is that no matter what we did neither of us could get these to stay in our ears. We changed the earbuds and tried the different sizes (my husband more than me because they are his but since I'm writing the review I tested them as well). As an added perturbation not only would they not stay in in general but because of the volume control being on the cord it weighed them down just enough to make things worse. The company added a clip to try to help keep them up but that made little difference and now you have headphones weirdly clipped to your shirt.It really is a shame these didn't work for what we needed; maybe we aren't earbud people. I know that I personally have very small ears but my husband does not so I thought he had a chance. I will say that they synced easily so that is a plus.If you like earbuds these may be the headphones for you but for us they didn't work out for either of us despite multiple attempts.I received this discounted product for my honest and unbiased review.

9:46 MinsWe have an had an Ibaby monitor since my son was born (almost 4 years now) and I have to say that this camera is a million times better than that monitor and I believe it is less expensive as well.I will admit that my husband is the one who wanted this and is the one who set this up so I had him help me with the video part of the review where we explain basic setup information as well as show you the picture on our computer and our phone.When we first got the Ibaby monitor we couldn't use it on Android which is a pain because I use droid and my husband has an Iphone but this one works on both; you just have to download the app and register it. Once registered you can move the camera with your phone (or desktop) and you can even adjust the picture as far as brightness and contrast, etc. The picture on this is fantastic, it is much better than our Ibaby. You can also add multiple cameras to the app so if you have them in different rooms you can look at them all from 1 screen. The best thing about this camera is that it has a two way intercom, I wish that our Ibaby had this. I remember nights when my son would wake up in the middle of the night or was misbehaving before going to sleep and I wish I had had the ability to tell him either it would be ok or to quit being bad and go to sleep and you can do that with this camera.You can take snapshots and video with this. This is where my only complaint comes in, the photos are uploaded to a cloud and from what we can tell those photos are eventually wiped out but we checked the ip address of the cloud and it is somewhere in Florida (we are in NY). May not seem like a big deal at first but this has an option on it to take a picture when it senses motion and let's say that you are walking around in your underwear or less; you're going to want to know where those photos are. :-)Otherwise we are more than thrilled with this camera. This is the perfect gift for any new parent or if you have a pet you want to keep an eye on or whatever else you can think of.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

I received 2 different shampoos and conditioners from luseta; the coconut and the argan, I like this set a lot better than the other. I have been using a different coconut shampoo and conditioner for a while now and I didn't realize there would be such a difference.First thing you notice is the smell, if you like the smell of coconut you're going to love this. Also, the smell lasts most of the day unlike my other shampoo.The bottles themselves are easy to pump and make it much easier to wash your hairThey are sulfate free; this is very important to me because I have a sulfate allergy and I know immediately if there is sulfate in my shampoo. The first sign that this is sulfate free is that there is no lather to the shampoo, the second sign for me is that I don't have a reaction to it. :-)This is a lightweight shampoo/conditioner set. I have  a lot of hair and some shampoos/conditioners weigh my hair down; I've noticed a major difference with this set.I thought my hair felt softer with this set than the argan set but that could just be me.Overall, I'm pleased with this product, it smells good, my hair looks good, and it's sulfate free, what's not to love?!I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

1:41 MinsUpdate: I just realized in the video part of this review I referred to these as a bracelet, I obviously know these are headbands but if you want to wear them as a bracelet don't let anyone tell you you can't. :-) Sorry, my mommy brain gets the best of me some days. :-)I absolutely love the color way of the orange/yellow/blue headband in this set; I'm also fond of the pink one but I am a huge fan of the other color combination so it is an easy win; besides my daughter went ahead and took the pink one anyway.My daughter and I have been trying out these headbands for a few days now. There is one complaint that we both have that is both a good and a bad thing. When you first put these on they slip up on the back of your head about 1" or so. After the initial slip they stay put all day long. I both like and dislike this. I have fairly short hair so when I used these while running and while in my hot tub the fact that they slipped and kept my hair off the back of my neck was a good thing but if I wanted to wear them out in public it wouldn't look too hot. If I had long hair it wouldn't be an issue at all.These are woven (obviously) and approximately 1/2" wide.  There is a grippy finish on the inside to help keep them from slipping. Where the ends meet is finished in black which provides a nice contrast.Overall they will work well for a variety of ages especially if you're a fan of that late 70's early 80's look.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

1:41 MinsI got this for my daughter, she is on her second year of playing viola and even though she is 10 she loves the infinity scarves I knit so I thought she would love this and sure enough she does.This is very light weight yet incredibly soft and silky. Because it is so light weight you could really wear this any time of year and be comfortable. There are so many outfits I can see my daughter wearing this with, I am confident it will be worn a lot.This would be a great gift for anyone who loves music. This would also be great for anyone of any age.I have no complaints whatsoever with this product and my daughter couldn't be happier with it; she can't wait to show all of her friends at school. I should have waited and gotten it for her for Christmas. :-)I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

3:05 MinsThis towel is way nicer than I had expected. When I first read that it was a waffle towel I immediately thought of my dishtowels that are like that and didn't anticipate it being as soft as it is. If you don't have experience with waffle towels they are very absorbent and this one is no exception and that is just the beginning.Whoever thought of the design of this towel was a genius. I admit that I don't get to go to the gym anymore since kid number 2 but I do hit my treadmill at least 3 days a week. I used this today for my run and it was great but then I realized all the benefits of this towel I could have used when I did go to the gym. There is a zippered pouch on this which is perfect if you only bring your keys into the gym with you; no more looking for an empty locker to put your keys in. If you have this towel you can throw your keys in it and keep them with you while you're working out. You can also throw your headphones and phone into it when you're on the way to the gym.The genius doesn't end there though. Thanks to the strap on the front of this you can take one side of the towel and pull it through and you now can keep it around your neck and not worry about it coming off or if you're like me working out at home you can hook it on the arm of your treadmill so that your new kitten doesn't pull it off. :-)This is the perfect gym towel, it is almost the swiss army knife of towels. Great product.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review but that in no way swayed the above statements.

My Dyson DC35 had been acting up, it would stop and start when I would push the button and it was getting very frustrating. After doing some research I found out it could be one of two things, the battery contacts might need to be cleaned or the filter might be having issues.I know that I have been bad about cleaning my filter in my dyson because when I clean it I have to wait at least 2 days before I can use it again and I have 2 dogs, a cat and 2 kids, I can't be without my vacuum for 2 days. So, when I took my filter out I knew that was the reason my vacuum wasn't working right. I tried rinsing it but, again it took 2 days and it smelled really bad. I knew it was time to get a new filter.This filter is obviously less expensive than the replacement from Dyson. It seems to be a little thinner but that might be because my original one is obviously gross.  This fit in my vacuum perfectly and helped a ton. My vacuum does still start and stop but not anywhere near as much as it did before so next I will try to clean the connections.I have not tried to rinse this yet to see if it dries quicker but if there are issues I will update this review. For now I'm very happy with this purchase.

3:03 MinsAs far as the design goes on this bento box it is adorable. My daughter takes her lunch to school occasionally and between her and my husband we were going through a lot of sandwich bags. She saw this box and really liked it so I figured I would give it a try.This is quite small, I included dimensions on the video review for it. If you're wondering if it can fit a sandwich (I hadn't tested that out yet on the video) it can but with italian bread which is slightly smaller than ranch or king bread but since that is what we buy it works out well. My daughter was able to put her turkey sandwich in the bottom. some popcorn in one of the top compartments and since she packed her own lunch I don't know what she put on the other side; I only know about the popcorn because she left the bag out and opened on the counter.My biggest complaint about this lunch box (other than it could have been slightly bigger) is that there is an elastic strap to hold it shut. This would not be a huge deal but it takes away from the super cute design and as soon as my daughter loses that (it's only a matter of time) we will have to resort to a rubber band.Otherwise this is super cute and my daughter is over the moon about it so I suppose that is what really matters.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

8:17 MinsI am by no means a professional when it comes to headphones, I know what I like and what I don't like. I don't use my headphones all the time just when I'm working out or when my son is sleeping and I'm cleaning the house and want to listen to music. These are examples of the few times that I get to listen to the music I like to listen to so I want it to sound good.There are definitely no issues with bass with these headphones.  The volume goes much louder than I would every need it to and the sound quality is fantastic. There is also no issue with comfort, these are cushioned and cushioned some more and then a little more. The graphics are stunning, they are bright and colorful and happy just like me. :-)These adjust so much that they fit my husband's giant head and my little head and my daughter's medium sized head. The earpieces completely cover my ears but my ears are tiny so I don't know if it is like that for everyone. They are 3.5"H x 2.75"W.My one complaint about these is that you can't change tracks in all apps. For example I was listening to Pandora which is my preferred music listening app and you can not skip tracks with these. I tried it with Itunes and it worked fine. This is the reason I went with 4 stars instead of 5 because this is kind of a big deal for me.I have included a video of how to sync these. That is the biggest issue for me with most products, if it is easy to sync or not because once it is synced the rest can be figured out easily enough. Syncing this is super easy. The only thing that confused me a little bit was that the device is called, "A". Once I figured that out I was able to sync it to my Ipad and my computer easily.These come with a ton of cords because they do so much. They come with a basic audio cable so you can use them without bluetooth, the charging cable to actually charge the headphones (they come fully charged by the way), an audio cable with a smart remote and mic so you can control the music/phone calls from the cable, and a Y audio cable so you can hook another set of headphones to these headphones.My daughter has decided that these are hers now so at least I got to try them out long enough to review them. If any issues arise I will try my best to update this review but for now as with my other bluedio headphones I'm impressed and these are way better than my previous pair.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

I purchased this 5 pack of batteries for my Syma X5C Quadcopter that only came with one battery. This was one of those investments you really need to make if you enjoy flying  quadcopter but want to do so more than 5 minutes at a time and having to wait an hour between charges! What I really like about this 5 pack is that it came with a usb charger that allows you to hook up all five batteries to be charged at once. Charging time seems to be about the same as if it were just one, maybe it is slightly longer I did not diligently keep track of the charging time. What I did notice is that these batteries last a few minutes longer than the battery that came with my quadcopter. My only beef with them is that they are slightly thicker than the original battery which makes for a tight fit but they do fit and as far as I can tell work very well! It is nice to get out the quad and fly it around knowing you have a good 25 - 30 minutes of flight before you have to recharge all of the batteries. This is especially important when you are first learning to fly one because minutes of practice and than 1 hour of downtime between your next flight makes practicing suck. These batteries were a good investment for extending my play time.

I purchased this 4 pound container of chlorine tablets for my hot tub sanitation needs. They work very well and dissolve very slowly, which makes the sanitation maintenance less of a burden than having to through in the granular chlorine several times a week vs once or twice a week. For that reason alone these are a great value. One tip though is to avoid opening the container and taking a whiff as it will not be a pleasant experience for you!Of course it depends on the type of hot tub you have if you can use these tabs without a basket to hold them in so be aware of that. The best thing about using this method is if you are going on vacation for a week you don't have to worry about anyone coming over to take care of your hot tub for you.

I purchased these replacement blades for my callus shaver that only came with one blade. The blades seem to be a better quality blade than the one generic blade that came with the shaver I previously purchased. There are several in each small box and are also wrapped in a safety wrapper so you don't cut yourself when trying to retrieve one out of the box for use. The one blade that came with my shaver became dull very quickly and that is not the case with these replacement blades. They are VERY sharp and shaved the callus on my feet with ease and they did not get dull as quickly. They have a blade on both ends so when one side does get dull you can flip it around and have a nice new sharp blade again. These blades will last me a long time and are a great quality product for the price.

I purchased this license plate bracket because I recently purchased my truck in a nearby state that does not require a front license plate so it did not have a bracket on it when I bought it. The Ford F150 has small slits right under the bumper that this bracket clips to and than conforms perfectly to the bumper and snaps right into place nice and solid. It was literally one of the easiest installs I have ever experienced, as it took me less than a minute to install! Although I will mention that this bracket does not come with the screws needed to actually mount the license plate to the bracket so just be aware of that. I personally think the price for this was a bit on the high end, but that is to be expected for genuine ford parts I suppose? Over all this is exactly what you need if you own a Ford F150 and need to mount a license plate on the front of it.

I recently purchased a new truck and the tow package on it was slightly further away from my trailer hook up than my old truck.This resulted in my old safety chains being too short and not reaching the hook ups on my truck. These were slightly longer and actually have a better weight rating than my old ones. Also, the hooks are very good quality, as are the chains. What I really like is that the hooks are fastened to the chains with pins which means If I ever find myself in this same situation again I will only need to replace the chains and not the hooks. The hooks also have a latch on them which is required in the state I live in and is just a better peace of mind than hooking on a chains that could possibly detach. These safety chains were a good find and well worth the investment!

I purchased this filter replacement for our Nordic Hot Tub and am glad I did because I shopped around at my local hot tub and pool shops and they want the exact same filter for twice the cost, so buying this online at half the cost is a no brainer. It was a perfect fit and I really did not realize how badly I needed to replace my filter until I put this one in and my water became crystal clear in less than 24 hours! My old filter was coming up on a year of usage with several cleanings within that time period and it was a PRB25 which means it has 25 foot of filtering material and this one is a PRB50 which means it has 50 foot of filtering material. It will be interesting to see how easy it will be to clean because there are twice as many folds in it, but I don't think it will be a problem because I always let my filters soak for 15 minutes in Muriatic acid which does all the hard work for me and then 15 minutes in a baking soda solution to neutralize the acid. Followed up with a thorough rinse with a hose which works WAY better than any of those milder filter cleaning chemicals out there. So, time will tell on the cleaning of it and I will update this review if there should be any problems in that area. Overall if your on the fence about going with the PRB25 or the PRB50, in my opinion spend a few extra bucks for the extra filtering.

3:55 MinsLove this bento box. My husband takes his lunch to work with him regularly and we were going through sandwich bags like crazy so I thought there had to be a better way. That is when I found this bento box. First I have to say that I love the simplicity of the design for this lunch box, it is perfect for any age and any gender. I got the black color because my husband wasn't home when I ordered it and I wasn't sure what he would want so I played it safe but this does come in a bunch of great colors.This is a nice large box too. It will easily fit a sandwich and have multiple compartments for other things. This is great because my husband is not a small guy and so he brings a decent size lunch, he also brings healthy snacks to eat throughout the day so he can but those in here too. This also includes a little spoon and fork that have their own compartments.This bento box seals up tightly and snaps shut, no added straps or hooks needed. There is not leaking either which is great.So far I can see this saving us money in baggies, and anything that makes packing lunch easier saves us money because it has to be quicker and easier than buying lunch to make it worthwhile. Best of all my husband was pretty impressed with this and seemed pleased with the idea so that is a huge plus.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

2:29 MinsThese solar fairy lights are super cool. I got the blue color ones but I had a really hard time deciding on which color I wanted. I like the fact that they kind of remind me of the old vintage bubble lights but with a modern twist.The bulbs have a plastic or acrylic drop shape around them that look like it has bubbles in it. They are 3" long and really quite beautiful. I also really like the fact that these are solar. My husband and I are one of those families that likes to add to our Christmas lights every year in the hopes that some day we have the house on National Lampoons Christmas Vacation. Of course they might end up on something in the front yard instead because they are almost too cool to hide in the back yard. :-)If I have any issues with these once winter hits I will update my review but so far I'm super impressed and can't wait to decorate with these.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

2:37 MinsI love these little fairy lights. This is the second set I've received and I remember when I got the first set I thought, "what am I going to do with these?". Turns out there are tons of neat things you can do with these. The last set we used on my daughter's bed. She has a loft bed that we built her a few years ago and it has a rock climbing wall on it and a bunch of other cool elements. We wrapped the lights around the foot and hand pegs for the rock climbing wall and they left off a surprising amount of light that is not overly bright so it works great as a night light for her.These lights are very tiny. They almost look like someone dropped bits of hot glue on some wire and somehow lit them up. These are great for little Christmas trees. That is probably what I'm going to use this set for. My kids have little Christmas trees for their rooms and Santa leaves a little present under them and so I'm thinking this set is going to decorate one of those trees; that is unless I come up with something else to use it for before that. :-)My only complaint about these lights (and it could be a good or bad thing depending on what you are using them for) is that the cord to plug them in isn't very long (under 2') but if you are using these for a little Christmas tree that is a great length.The possibilities are endless for these lights, it's just a matter of using your imagination.I received this complimentary product for my honest review.

2:58 MinsI got these for my husband because he says if we were rich he would have a different pair of socks to wear every day (it's the little things I suppose). He wears a size 13 shoe and he said they fit him fine but the cut was lower than he likes. Good news is, his loss is my gain because I love these socks.First they come in 3 colors. It's not that you are going to see them when your shoes are on but it's still nice to have different colors. There is a nice attention to detail on these socks. The stitching around the arch area adds a little extra support. I also really like the color details on the bottom.I appreciate the fact that these just follow the line of my sneakers so they're barely visible. I have a tattoo that goes down my leg and onto my foot and most socks cover part of it up but these socks don't. Also these are nice thickness, they're not overly thin where my toe is going to go through them after wearing them a couple of times but they're also not so thick that they're not breathable. I wore them while doing my couch 2 5k the other day and my feet weren't all sweaty and I wore them all day today and they are quite comfortable.If you like a low profile sock and especially one that supports your arch a little I think these are a great option.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

There's not a lot you can say about vegetable/ fruit cleaning brushes. If they work they work and these work. The bristles are soft enough to clean a tomato without damaging the skin but strong enough to clean a sweet potato and get in all the creases. They remind me of the bristles they use on baby brushes.Nothing drives me more nuts that when my potatoes aren't clean and you can taste the little bits of grit, yuk. These solve that problem, no more dirty potatoes for us.The other thing that is nice about these is that they have a plastic cover. When I'm not using items like this they all end up in a bowl next to my sink. This bowl includes my metal scrubbers and other dish cleaning items so having a cover on these makes me feel better.I can see these getting used a lot. We eat a lot of fruits and vegetables and it is important to me that they are cleaned and now it will be that much easier with these brushes. Just another one of those random useful kitchen items that everyone should have and most people don't.I received this discounted product for my honest and unbiased review.

I play cards against humanity a lot, it is my dad's favorite game, he insists that I bring it to every family function. It has gotten to the point that we needed an expansion pack because we kept getting the same cards over and over, my dad even volunteered to pay for an expansion pack, that's how much he loves it. :-)My version of cards against humanity is the downloaded for free version that we printed. In case you didn't know this you can download the original game for free and then pay for expansion packs. Because we printed ours ourselves I don't know how the texture and feel of these cards compare to to the original game. I also don't know why you would need the original game to play these expansion packs other than needing the basic game instructions.All that being said, some of these cards are way crazier than the original game. I pulled out a few from each deck that I liked the most that I can post here without having to worry about the age of the person reading this review.Pack 1:Black card favorites:  *What gave me unforgiving, ever lasting, flaming diarrhea?  *When listening to a Creed album, I feel like, __________.White card favorites:  *Slamming a live fish on the counter and calling it dinner  *Elton John's wardrobe  *Getting really concerned about global warming for a few seconds.Pack 2:Black Card Favorites:  *The only thing worse than ____________ is _____________.  *The greatest lie ever told was ______________.  *What did I do that caused my parents to beat me as a child?White Card Favorites:  *Walking into the wrong delivery room  *Keeping the pimp hand strongPack 3:Favorite Black Cards:  *I like my coffee like I like my women: strong and ____________.  *Now is my time: I'm young, dumb and full of _____________.  *___________ is the leading cause for blindness in white males.Favorite White Card:  *Ordering dessert after calling off a wedding engagementPack 4:Favorite Black Cards:  *In my day, __________ only cost a nickel.  *What's in the back of my white paneled van?  *Eat your ________ child.Favorite White Cards:  *Ricky Bobby  *Asparagus Urine  *Propane and Propane accessories  *Desperate Tinder DatesObviously these are PG examples of some of the cards, there are a lot of cards in the deck that I could not believe what I was reading but that is why the original game is a, "game for horrible people" and I think some of these are that 10 fold.It is hard to say which of these packs is my favorite that is why getting all 4 is probably a good idea so that you can mix and match them and create an awesome deck. Some of the decks had more black cards that I liked and some had more white ones that I liked. I would have to say that if I had to pick two decks that are my favorite it would be packs 1 & 4.I can not wait to go home again and play this with my family. I have never seen some of my family members laugh as hard as when we play this awful, awful, wonderful card game. :-)I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

7:25 MinsNot only were these running boards easy to install (partly because the instructions were clear and easy to follow) but after we installed them our truck looks great.Basic tools you need for install:A socket set, (I believe we ended up using 13, 14 and 16mm sockets),a socket extender, a wrench and a headlamp and safety glasses don't hurt. So, since those are the only tools you need you can guess that there isn't a ton to the install of these.I have added step by step instruction to my video review as well as images of the finished product. The first side took us a little while because we were filming and learning what we were doing right and what we are doing wrong (I put a couple tips in the video). Also, there's the fact that we had a neighbor who decided to use his chainsaw while we were filming so we were trying to film in between cutting breaks.  The second side took maybe 1/2 hour to install.These seem very strong. My husband is not a small guy, I'm not a small girl for that matter, and these easily support us. I like that the tops have a tread on them to step on, we live in New York so things get awfully slippery in the winter. I also like that these are pretty low profile, they don't take away from the look of our truck (2007 Ford F150).Overall we are very happy with the install of these running boards and how they turned out. We're also very happy with the fact that we no longer have to get a running start to get into our truck.For some reason videos are not uploading right now so for now you can see the video part of this review on youtube: https://youtu.be/XfYB81f2dgcI received this discounted product for my honest and unbiased review but that in no way swayed the above statements.

2:35 MinsFirst let me say right off the bat I love the design of this. I'm a fan of modern, clean lined design and that is exactly what this is. This pet feeding station almost looks futuristic. It is raised up just the right amount too. Since I have a Jack Russell who is 17 pounds and a Jack in the Box (jack russell boxer) who is 60# pounds and all legs I need their dishes to be accommodating to both of them.The body of this is plastic but it feels like a very durable plastic, there is no give or bending to it from what I can tell. It is also high gloss, it's so high gloss that you can see my reflection in the video I did for this review.My only complaint is that I could handle the bowls being slightly deeper. Because my one dog is so big she will probably eat both bowls in one sitting but that is actually a good thing because if the food sits out I noticed that some how ants are getting to it and then I have to throw the food out and waste it. Also, if your pet has a weight problem this would work out well for you too.  The other time this would be good is when we are camping, we don't like to put too much food and water out in our camper because inevitably someone is going to knock it over (most likely my 3 year old).  Even though these are all benefits to a smaller bowl I still could have handled them deeper.Overall, I love the design of this and the fact that you can take the bowls out individually and wash them if needed unlike your typical double  bowl feeding stations. Plus, it looks awesome in my kitchen. :-)I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

2:43 MinsI first heard about pet fountains when I was at the vet's office one day. I have been a cat owner for years and my 16 year old cat recently passed away so when my husband surprised me with a kitten for my birthday I wanted to make sure I kept her as healthy as I could so she would have a nice long life. Part of that is owning a pet fountain.I had heard that your cat will be drawn more to the fountain and be more apt to drink from it because they can see it better, they like the falling water, etc. It is important for your pets to stay hydrated and just like humans they are more likely to do that if their water is fresh. Think about it, would you rather drink fresh from the water cooler water or water that has just been sitting in a glass for who knows how long. Also, because this circulates the water you don't have to fill the water bowl as often which is nice if you're busy like most people are.This was fairly easy to set up; it includes step by step instructions with pictures. Basically you take the top of the unit and flip it upside down, put the pump in and then turn the support bar so that the pump stays put. Next you take the filter (which is included and there are two extra filter pads included as well) and you rinse it off with tap water then slide it in its slot. You put the top on and fill it with water and plug it in with the cord that is included (the cord is quite long).The only thing that was a little confusing to me was the words for the min/max water lines are on the inside bottom of the bowl but the actual lines are on the side so that took me a minute. Otherwise setup for this is pretty cut and dry.This is incredibly quiet. I took a video of it because as soon as we filled it up and put it on the floor our new kitten, Helvetica, (she's 4 months) came running right over to it to check it out and was drinking from it at every possible angle; it was quite cute. I guess that this is so mesmerizing that even my 3 year old son decided he needed to drink from it when no one was looking. :-)Overall my kitten seems to really like this and it seems like she is indeed drinking more. My dogs on the other hand couldn't care less they still seem to drink the same amount but they're older and stubborn. :-)If you're wondering how big this is it is approximately: 11" x 11" the tallest part is 6"H but the bowl is 3"H. Those are by no means exact measurements because it was hard to measure this since it is currently full of water.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

0:58 MinsI got this for my daughter and she loved it so much she decided she had to pack her lunch the next day despite the fact that they were serving one of her favorite lunches. I have to agree with her that as soon as it arrived I loved the pattern on this lunch bag. I thought at first that it was going to be like another lunch bag that we have that do not close properly or just have Velcro to hold them shut but it actually has a zipper to keep it closed which is good because the ones that use Velcro are stupid to me; they're never going to be able to keep anything cold.When this arrives it arrives flat so at first you think, "there is no way this is going to hold anything" but then you unfold it and realize that it is actually quite large. She said she even had friends ask her where she got it.Like I said my daughter (by the way she's 10) really likes this. I have pretty large legs and so like most of the reviews I read if you have bigger legs you are going to have one stretched out tardis. I was able to get these on no problem and they stayed up without issue so if they didn't have a tardis on them they would have been perfect for me but then again they wouldn't be doctor who related and would be just striped socks which are not nearly as cool.All that being said as far as socks go these are super comfortable and a perfect medium sock (not too thick not too thin). However, if you are not the proud owner of teeny tiny legs you're going to end up with a tardis that looks big on the outside which all doctor who fans know, it's only supposed to look big on the inside.It's a shame that these stretch the way they do because I really like the colors and the design. Oh well, I'm crafty, I'll find some way to make them work and until I come up with something at least I have doctor who socks stretched out tardis or not. :-)I received this discounted product for my honest and unbiased review

This dog collar is beyond cute!  I ordered the small and I wasn't sure exactly if it would fit my dog but it fit him perfect right out of the package. He is a Jack Russell and I love the way this looks on him. I know Christmas is a ways away but, confession, he's wearing it right now and I have no interest in taking it off of him. :-)The reindeer on the pattern are very small and at first you don't realize they are reindeer but I really like the pattern of this collar, it's possible that I have sweater with a similar pattern but that is neither here nor there and no I am not a crazy dog lady it's mere coincidence.The buckle on this is hard plastic and snaps together tightly and I don't foresee having any problems with it holding my back my tiny little ball of fur covered muscle. If you are familiar with Jack Russells you know that they are very strong for their size so you need a durable collar. This adjusts quite a bit, I think the description says about 4" and I would say that is dead on. At it's smallest it fits my russell (he's 14 so his neck isn't as big as it used to be) and then goes up 4 more inches so it seems like it would fit a lot of medium sized dogs.I just love to see my little guy with his bow tie. I tried to get some good pictures of it on him but he was being a stinker, then again he's a russell so I expect no less from him.If you have any questions feel free to leave a comment and I'll try my best to answer them but for now if you're considering this collar for the Holidays do it. I can't wait to get a picture of my pup in front of the Christmas tree wearing this.I received this discounted product for my honest and unbiased review.

2:23 MinsThese tags are great! I'm a knitter and I have started knitting things to sell at craft fairs and I was trying to figure out how I wanted to add price tags. I didn't want just stickers or something that was going to take away from my products. They have the holes already scored and you just have to pop them out and add your string and you're all set.Of course these are no good if you can't write on them so I tried them out with a standard ballpoint pen and had no issues, they were nice and smooth to write on. I have included measurements in my video review but there is enough room on these to add a price, a quick description of my item and my website so I'm more than happy!I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

2:53 MinsThis is a very well made vintage designed briefcase. The reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I feel like it could be a little bigger. I suppose it really depends on your profession and what you intend to use this for as to whether or not you think it might be big enough. I got this for my mother who I'm pretty sure carries everything she owns in her briefcase. This is perfect if you're just planning on bringing a tablet or possibly a small laptop and a some basic office products so I could see why it would work for a lot of people. Even when I was working as a designer I know this wouldn't have worked for me because I always needed to bring fan decks (paint samples) and tape measures and notebooks and client folders and I know it would have been a tight fit.All that being said this is very well constructed and I love the simplicity of the design of this product. The brass hardware against the reddish-brown leather is a nice compliment. The leather is smooth and shiny and will hold up well even if you get stuck in the rain with this. The strap is not leather but what feels like nylon so it should hold up well. The handles are leather and a nice thick leather as well that definitely will hold up well over long term use.There is a large pocket on the front of this which would easily hold a tablet and then the big zippered pocket has a divider, two open pockets, two pen holders and a smaller zippered pocket inside.If you don't require a lot of storage space for your work this is going to be a great briefcase for you but if you do require a lot of space you may want to look into something slightly larger.I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.

3:48 MinsOh, I had high hopes for this product, I really did. As a mom of two I want anything that encourages my children to brush their teeth and I'll take any gimmick I can get. I also can not stand going into the bathroom and seeing where they tried to put their toothpaste on their toothbrushes and it's all over my sink. All that being said I was hoping that this would be the perfect solution.First, there are instructions but they are not that good. The instructions are limited and on the outside on the box; they really don't tell you much other than to take the lid off the top of the toothpaste and make sure you get it in there tight; it does not tell you how to actually operate the product. I started with my kid's toothpaste but that was running a little low so I tried our new tube. When putting the new tube in I made a mess because there was no way to get it in there tight without toothpaste coming out. Once I finally got some toothpaste in there I realized you do not press the silver strip on the top that looks like a button (especially since it says touch me right above it) but rather you put your toothbrush in the bottom and push. You don't just do it once you do it multiple times to sort of "prime of the pump". Even after this is primed however very little toothpaste comes out and when it does if your toothbrush is not at the right angle it just falls to the bottom under the button and looks like it would be a complete pain to clean.As for the toothbrush holder this seems like a better idea but I will say that my son's battery operated electric toothbrush just barely fit in this so there is no way he will be able to do that by himself.I'm hoping that maybe I'm doing something wrong here but for now I'm not impressed.I received this discounted product for my honest and unbiased review.
